She will use this loan to buy a dairy cow. She says that thanks to this business she receives an income. Carmen wants to buy more cows and continue to pay for her children’s studies.

loans.use: to buy a dairy cow.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase a variety of goods

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to purchase beverages and juice drinks

loans.name: Roberto Antonio

texts.es:
Roberto, estudió hasta noveno grado de educacion básica, está acompañado, su pareja trabaja en los oficios domesticos, tiene dos hijos, pero no viven con el.

Roberto, tiene un cafetín en la escuela de su comunidad y tiene solamente un año de tenerlo, tambien hace viajes con su carro. Su horario es de 6:00 a.m a 4:00 p.m de lunes a viernes.

Roberto, necesita el crédito para comprar productos para la venta en el cafetin, esto mejorará su negocio ya que va ofrecer diferentes productos.

Sus sueños son, poder trabajar lo menos que se pueda, para poder ampliar su venta y asi poder tener mejores ingresos, para darles un mejor futuro a su familia.
texts.en:
Roberto studied up to the ninth grade of elementary school. He is in a relationship; his partner works as a housekeeper. He has two children, but they do not live with him. Roberto owns a small cafeteria in a local school. He has had it only for a year. He also transports passengers in his car. He works from 6:00 am until 4:00 pm, Monday to Friday.

Roberto needs this loan to buy products for his cafeteria. This will improve his business, since he will be able to offer different products. His dreams are to be able to work as long as he can, and increase his sales in order to receive a better income and give his family a better future.

loans.use: to buy products to sell in his cafeteria.

loans.name: Maria Alicia

texts.es:
María, estudió hasta cuarto grado de educación básica, está acompañada y su pareja trabaja en la agricultura, tiene tres hijos, pero solo uno vive en casa y los otros están acompañados y tienen sus propios hogares. 

Maria, trabaja con ganado bovino de repasto, lo ha hecho por cuatro años y lo aprendió de un cuñado y decidió hacerlo cuando se separó de su compañero de vida, ya que tenía que buscar un ingreso económico, para sostener a sus hijos.- También, trabaja en una panadería y la distancia qie tiene que caminar para llegar hasta su lugar de trabajo es de 1 km.

María, necesita el crédito para comprar alimento para su ganado.

Sus sueños son, poder trabajar lo mejor que se pueda, para poder darle un mejor futuro a sus hijos.
texts.en:
María studied up to the fourth grade of elementary school. She is in a relationship; her partner works in agriculture. She has three children, but only one lives with her. The other children have their own families.

María raises cattle. She has been doing it for four years, taught by her brother-in-law. She decided to start working with this after finishing her previous relationship, since she had to look for some income to maintain her children. She also works in a bakery, and has to walk 1 km (0.6 miles) to get there.

María needs a loan to buy feed for her cattle.  Her dream is to work as long as she can in order to give her children a better future.

loans.use: to buy feed for her cattle.

loans.name: Grupo Guineales La Cuchilla Group

texts.es:
Izabela es una mujer de 35 años de edad, ella  vive en la comunidad de Guineales, junto a su esposo y su único hijo. 

Izabela (primera de  izquierda a derecha en la fotografía)  es una mujer que busca prosperidad para su familia, y con esa mentalidad  hace cuatro años decido poner un negocio, que es la venta de ropa típica, al principio solo vendía en la comunidad donde vive, pero ahora ya sale a vender a  los lugares circunvecinos, de esta manera ella genera ingreso para apoyar a su esposo  para satisfacer otras necesidades en beneficio de su familia,  la meta de Izabela es seguir con el negocio y cada día hacerlo más grande, pues con esta  con esta idea ella necesita capital de trabajo, por esa razón ella se acerca a ADICLA para adquirir un prestamo que le servirá para comprar más ropa para tener variedad y estilos según la demanda de su clientela. 

Sus metas futuras de Izabela es que su negocio sea cada vez más grande  y tener un local que sea apto para exhibir su venta  y con la generación de ganancias ella piensa mejor su vivienda.
texts.en:
Izabela is a 35 year old woman and she lives in the Guineales community together with her husband and her only son. Izabela (the first on the left in the photograph) is a woman who searches for prosperity for her family and with this mentality, she decided to start her business four years ago. 

Her business is purchasing and selling typical clothing. In the beginning, she only sold in the community where she lives, but now she has progressed to selling in the surrounding areas. This way she generates income to support her husband to satisfy their needs for the benefit of the family. 

Izabela's goal is to continue with her business and make it larger each day. With this idea in mind, Izabela needs more working capital. For this reason, she approached ADICLA to request a loan that will allow her to continue purchase more clothing to have variety and styles according to her customers' demands. The future goals of Izabela are that her business keeps growing larger, that she will have a shop that will be appropriate for her to exhibit her sales, and that the with the generation of income, she will be able to improve her home.

loans.use: to purchase typical clothing

loans.name: Baktygul

texts.ru: Бактыгуль 42 года, она замужем, есть дочь, ей 13 лет. У Бактыгуль средне-специальное образование, с 2004 года занимается животноводческой и полеводческой деятельностью. На сегодняшний день она имеет в хозяйстве 1 теленка, 6 овец и 2 лошади. Бактыгуль арендует 1,0 Га земли, где выращивает овощи и клевер. Ежемесячный доход от бизнеса приносит прибыль до 18,000 сомов (KGS) в месяц. Для содержания скота есть все условия, заготовлены корм и сено. В Банк "Бай-Тушум" Бактыгуль обратилась за кредитом в сумме 70,000 сом (KGS) на покупку 3 бычков. Увеличение поголовья скота позволит улучшить материальное благосостояние семьи, а также накопить на обучение ее дочери.
texts.en:
Baktygul is 42, married, and has a thirteen-year-old daughter.  Baktygul has the equivalent of a high school education with some vocational training, and has worked as a crop and livestock farmer since 2004.  She currently has one calf, six sheep and two horses on her farm, and also rents 1.0 hectares of land for growing vegetables and clover.  Her monthly income from her business brings in up to 18,000 som worth of profit each month.  She has all the right conditions in place for raising livestock, and has laid in stores of hay and fodder for her animals.  

Baktygul has requested a loan of 70,000 from Bai Tushum Bank to buy three bull calves.  Increasing her headcount of livestock will allow her to improve her family's well-being, and set aside money for her daughter's education as well.

loans.use: buy three bull calves in order to invest in her business

loans.name: Maria Teresa

texts.es: Teresa es una señora que toda su vida la  ha pasado en el campo, y por este motivo la fuente de ingresos es la crianza de animales y la agricultura, Teresa tiene 51 años de edad, su esposo trabaja a l jornal y Teresa tiene 3 hijos mismos que ya son independientes, el crédito lo necesita para comprar chanchos,  la aspiración de Teresa es mejorar su negocio y seguir trabajando con tranquilidad y velar por su hogar.
texts.en: Teresa is someone who has spent her whole live in the country. As such, her main source of income is from raising livestock and agriculture. Teresa is 51 years old and she and her husband, who works for the local newspaper, have three grown children. She needs this loan to buy pigs and pursue her aim of improving her business and continuing to work steadily and care for her home.

loans.use: to buy pigs

loans.name: Piedad Olimpia

texts.es: Piedad a sus 39 años de edad esta casada y tiene 5 hijos de las edades de 23, 20 16, 13 y 2años de edad, a mas de eso viven 2 nietos con ella, su esposo se dedica al jornal de trabajos del campo, Piedad se dedica a la crianza de animales menores y al jornal, el crédito lo va  a invertir en la compra de chanchos para seguir adelante en su negocio, la aspiración de Piedad es de  sacar adelante a sus hijos y nietos.
texts.en: Piedad, age 39, is married and has five children, ages 23, 20, 16, 13, and 2. In addition, she also has two nephews living with her. Her husband works as a day laborer in the fields and Piedad works raising livestock and also as a day laborer. With this loan, she will invest in the purchase of some pigs in order to grow her business. Piedad's ambition is to make a better life for her children and nephews.

loans.use: to buy pigs

loans.name: Delmy Noemy

texts.es: Delmy de 47 años de edad vive en casa propia con sus cinco hijos, ella se dedica desde hace 12 años al cultivo de maíz y frijol, comercializa sus productos en los diferentes mercados, ella está solicitando un crédito para la compra de semillas, fertilizantes, bonos, herbicidas y mejorar el terreno que muestra la fotografía  para seguir con sus cultivos y así tener mejores ingresos.
texts.en: Delmy, 47, lives in her own home with her five children.  For 12 years, she has been cultivating corn and beans.  She sells her products in various markets.  Delmy is requesting a loan to buy seeds, chemical and organic fertilizers, and herbicides, and also to improve the land that is shown in the photograph, so that she can continue with her farming and generate more income.

loans.use: to buy agricultural supplies and to improve her land

loans.name: Rony Alexi

texts.es: Rony de 30 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposa y sus dos hijos, el es empleado de una empresa privada, con lo que obtiene en su trabajo logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, el quiere mejorar su vivienda construyendo dos cuartos en el lugar que muestra la fotografía, pero con lo que gana en su trabajo no le alcanza para poder realizarlo, el está solicitando un crédito para la compra de ladrillos, arena, cemento, hierro, laminas y pago de mano de obra, para que el y su familia puedan vivir mas seguros y cómodos.
texts.en: Rony, 30, lives in his own house with his wife and their 2 children.  He works for a private company, and with the earnings from this job he is able to cover some of the household expenses.  He wants to improve his house by building two rooms in the place shown in the photograph, but his earnings from his job are not sufficient to pay for this, so he is requesting a loan.  With his loan, he will buy bricks, sand, cement, steel, and sheets of corrugated metal, and he will also pay for labor costs.  This way, he and his family will be able to live with more security and comfort.

loans.use: to add 2 rooms to his house

loans.name: Altynkul

texts.ru: Алтынкул 55 лет, вдова, мать 3 детей, образование среднее. Двое детей живут с Алтынкул и помогают ей на протяжении многих лет заниматься животноводством и полеводством. Алтынкул добилась очень хороших результатов, у нее есть 2 дойные коровы, 1 теленок, 8 овец и 2 козы. Ежемесячный доход Алтынкул составляет около 8,000 сом (KGS). Этих средств катастрофически не хватает на достойную жизнь Алтынкул и ее детей. Для дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Алтынкул обратилась в Банк «Бай - Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 70,000 сом (KGS) на покупку лошади. На прибыль от кредита Алтынкул планирует увеличить своё хозяйство и доходы ее семьи.
texts.en: Altynkul is 55 years old, a widow, and the mother of three children.  She has a secondary education.  Two of her children live with her, and for many years, they have helped her to raise livestock and to grow crops. Altynkul has been very successful: she currently owns two cows, one calf, eight sheep and two goats.  She makes a monthly income of about 8,000 som (KGS), which is still vastly insufficient to provide a decent life for herself and her family.  In order to further grow her business, Atynkul has turned to Bai Tushum Bank CJSC and requested a loan of 70,000 som (KGS) to buy a horse.  With the benefits from her loan, Altynkul is planning to expand her farming business and increase her family's income.

loans.use: to purchase one horse in order to increase her profits

loans.name: Zhazgul

texts.ru: Жазгуль 28 лет, замужем, мать 3 детей. В качестве источника дохода для своей семьи, Жазгуль занимается животноводством и полеводством, начав этот бизнес 5 лет назад с собственных сбрережений. Благодаря упорному труду Жазгуль, ее бизнес, на сегодняшний день насчитывает 2 дойные коровы, что позволяет ей иметь доход от продажи молока. На собственном участке мерою 0,35 Га она выращивает сахарную свеклу. В совокупности деятельность приносит прибыль в сумме 15,000 сом (KGS) в месяц. В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Жазгуль обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 40,000 сом (KGS) на покупку коровы. Доходы от кредита Жазгуль планирует вложить в дальнейшее расширение бизнеса и накопить на ремонт дома.
texts.en: Zhazgul is 28 years old, married, and the mother of three children.  In order to provide a source of income for her family, she is involved in animal husbandry and crop farming.  She started this activity five years ago using her own savings.  Thanks to her very hard work, her farming business now comprises two dairy cows, which allows her to make an income from the sale of milk.  She also grows sugar beets on 0.35 hectare of her own land.  In total, her activity brings her an income of 15,000 som (KGS) per month.  In order to further grow her business, Zhazgul has turned to Bai Tushum Bank CJSC and requested a loan of 40,000 som (KGS) to buy a cow.  She plans to use the earnings from her loan to further grow her business and to renovate her house.

loans.use: to purchase one cow in order to expand her farming business.

loans.name: Erkingul

texts.ru: Эркингул 44 года, замужем, все дети взрослые, младший сын живет с родителями. У Эркингул- среднее образование, она знает, как правильно использовать и планировать денежные средства для достижения поставленных целей. В качестве основного дохода для своей семьи, Эркингул с 1994 года занимается животноводством и полеводством, на сегодняшний день в ее хозяйстве имеется 2 коровы с телятами, 10 овец, 1 лошадь, также есть 1,20 ГА собственной земли, где Эркингул выращивает ячмень. Ежемесячный доход от реализации экологически чистой продукции составляет около 15,000 сом (KGS). Эркингул заготовила достаточно сена и корма для скота на эту зиму, поэтому она решила обратиться в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 100,000 сом (KGS) на покупку двух коров. Доходы от кредита Эркингул планирует вложить в дальнейшее расширение своего бизнеса и хочет накопить средства на постройку сарая.
texts.en: Erkingul is 44 years old and married.  All her children are grown up, but her youngest son still lives with the family.  Erkingul has a secondary education.  She knows how to appropriately use and invest her money to achieve the goals that she has set for herself.  She has been involved in animal husbandry and agriculture since 1994, and this activity constitutes her family's main source of income.  She currently owns two cows with their calves, 10 sheep, one horse, and she also grows barley on 1.2 hectare of her own land.  She makes a monthly income of about 15,000 som from the sale of her organic farming products.  She has garnered enough hay and livestock feed for her animals this winter and has therefore decided to apply for a 100,000-som (KGS) loan from Bai Tushum Bank CJSC, to purchase two cows.  Erkingul is planning to use the earnings from her loan to further expand her business and to save enough money to build a barn.

loans.use: to purchase two cows for fattening and resale.

loans.name: Sonia Patricia

texts.es: Sonia es una joven de 20 años, es madre soltera y su hijo tiene 4 años, ella comenta que vive en una casa humilde junto a sus padres, hermanos, sobrinos y sus hijo, sus padres se dedican al jornal y es asi como le pueden apoyar con su hijo que ya asiste a la escuela, son 2 años que Sonia se dedica a la crianza de animales menores y el crédito lo necesita para comprar pollos, la aspiracion de Sonia es que su hijo siga estudiando y ella también sacar por lo menos la educación básica ya que esta estudiando a distancia por las tardes.
texts.en:
Sonia is a 20-year-old young woman.  She is a single mother with a 4-year-old son.  She says that she lives in a humble house along with her parents, siblings, nieces and nephews and her son.  Her parents are day labourers and that is how they can help her to support her son who already is in school. 

For two years Sonia has been working at raising small animals.  She needs the loan in order to buy young chickens.  Sonia's aspiration is that her son continues studying and that she also can at least have a basic education since she is studying in the evenings via distance learning.

loans.use: to buy young chickens

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase some livestock in order to invest in her business.

loans.name: Jose  Antonio

texts.es: José de 62 años de edad es viudo vive en casa propia con sus dos hijos quienes trabajan y le ayudan económicamente, el se dedica desde hace 5 años al cultivo de arroz, maíz y maicillo, vende sus productos en los pueblos aledaños y ya tiene clientes fijos, el está solicitando un crédito para la compra de semillas, fertilizantes, abonos, controles de plagas y mejorar el terreno que muestra la fotografía, y así poder seguir con sus cultivos para generar mejores ingresos.
texts.en: José is a 62-year-old widower who lives in his own home with his two children who work. He helps them financially. He has been growing rice, maize, and sorghum for five years. He is requesting a loan for the purchase of seeds, fertilizers, pest control, and improving the field shown in the photograph so he can continue growing his crops and generate better income.

loans.use: to purchase seeds, fertilizers, manure, pest control, and improve his farmland

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase two cows and ten sheep for fattening and resale.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to invest in catalog products and breed chickens

loans.name: Eusebio

texts.es: Eusebio de 36 años de edad se dedica desde hace 10 años a la agricultura siembra maíz y frijoles,  comercializa sus productos en los diferentes mercados que se encuentran cerca de su casa, vive con su esposa y sus tres hijos en casa propia, el está solicitando un crédito para la compra de semillas, fertilizantes, abonos, controles de plagas, etc. y mejorar el terreno que muestra en la fotografía para poder continuar con su trabajo y tener mejores ingresos.
texts.en: Eusebio is 36 years old. For 10 years, he has planted corn and beans. He sells his products in different markets close to his home. He is requesting a loan for the purchase of seeds, fertilizers, pest control, etc. and to improve the farmland shown in the photograph to continue his work and have a higher income.

loans.use: to purchase seeds, fertilizers, and pest control for his farmland

loans.name: Edith Yolanda

texts.es: Edith de 30 años de edad vive en casa propia con sus dos hijos, ella se dedica desde muy joven a la agricultura al cultivo de maíz y frijol, cuando ya está su cosecha la comercializa en los pueblos aledaños, ya tiene muchos clientes fijos, Edith está solicitando un crédito para la compra de semillas, fertilizantes, abonos, controles de plagas, herbicidas, etc. y mejorar el terreno que muestra en la fotografía para poder continuar con sus cultivos ya que esa es su única fuente de trabajo y así tener mejores ingresos.
texts.en:
Edith is 30 years old and lives in her own home with her two children. She has from a very young age worked as a farmer, growing corn and beans. After harvesting her crops, she sells them in nearby towns, where she has many regular customers. 

Edith is applying for a loan for the purchase of seeds, fertilizers, manure, pesticides, herbicides, and other supplies. These investments will also help her to improve her land, which is shown in the photo, and keep growing her crops. The farm is her only source of work, and purchasing these supplies will allow Edith to earn higher income.

loans.use: to purchase seeds, fertilizers, manure, herbicides, pesticides, and other supplies, and to improve her land.

loans.name: Oscar Armando

texts.es: Oscar de 35 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposa, el es empleado de una empresa privada desde hace 3 años y con lo que obtiene de su trabajo logra solventar los gastos de su hogar, Oscar quiere mejorar su vivienda repellando las paredes y encementando el piso, pero con lo que gana en su trabajo no le alcanza para realizarlo por eso solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito para poder comprar arena, cemento y pago de mano de obra, para que el y su esposa puedan vivir más seguros y cómodos.
texts.en:
Oscar is 35 years old, and lives with his wife in a home that they own. Oscar has worked for a private company for the past three years, and his salary allows him to meet the couple's expenses. 

Oscar would like to make improvements to his home, plastering the walls and installing a cement floor. His salary, however, isn't enough to pay for this project, so he's applying for a loan from INTEGRAL for the purchase of sand, cement, and to pay laborers. These home improvements will allow Oscar and his wife to live in a safer, more comfortable home.

loans.use: to purchase sand, cement, and to pay laborers.

loans.name: Ana Julia

texts.es: Ana de 58 años de edad vive en casa propia con su grupo familiar, ella posee una pequeña tienda ubicada en su lugar de residencia, con lo que obtiene de sus ventas logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, ella quiere mejorar su vivienda colocando puertas y piso cerámico, pero con lo que obtiene de sus ventas no le alcanza por eso solicita un crédito a INTEGRAL para poder comprar cemento, cerámica, arena, puertas y pago de mano de obra para que ella y su familia puedan vivir más cómodos.
texts.en:
Ana is 58 years old, and lives in her own home with her family. She runs a small store in the home, which generates enough income to meet some of the household expenses. 

Ana would like to make improvements to the home, installing doors and a tile floor, but the store's sales aren't high enough to pay for the project. Ana is therefore applying for a loan from INTEGRAL to purchase cement, tiles, sand, and doors, and to pay for laborers. These improvements will allow Ana and her family to live in a more comfortable home.

loans.use: to purchase cement, tiles, sand, and doors, and to pay laborers.

loans.name: Nazira

texts.ru: Назира, 29 лет, замужем, 4 детей. У Назиры высшее образование, с 2000 года в качестве дополнительного дохода занимается сельским хозяйством. У нее в хозяйстве есть 4 коровы, 7 овец и 2 лошади, также есть арендованный земельный надел мерою 2,0 ГА, где она выращивает перец, клевер для реализации. Назира аккуратная, спокойная.Для дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Назира обратилась в Банк «Бай – Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 70,000 сом (KGS) на покупку коров, для увеличения поголовья скота. Доходы от кредита Назира планирует использовать для развития своего хозяйства.
texts.en:
Nazira is 29 years old, married, and the mother of four children.  She is a college graduate.  Since 2000, she has been involved in agriculture, an activity which represents an additional source of income for her family.  She currently owns four cows, seven sheep and two horses.  She also grows pepper and clover for resale on two hectares of leased land.

Nazira is meticulous and quiet.  In order to further grow her farming business, she has turned to Bai Tushum Bank CJSC and applied for a loan of 70,000 som (KGS) to buy some cows and increase the size of her herd.  She is planning to use the earnings from her loan to develop her farming business.

loans.use: to purchase cattle in order to increase her herd.

loans.name: Digna Julia

texts.es: A sus 50 años de edad Digna es una señora muy trabajadora, esta casada  y tiene 5 hijas de  las cuales 3  viven con en su casa,  el esposo de Digna se dedica a trabajar de albañil, Digna comenta que por medio de la agricultura y de la ganadería es como a sacado a sus hijas adelante, por este motivo necesita el crédito para comprar una vaca lechera ya que por medio de la venta de la leche le alcanza sus ingreso para que sus hijas asistan al colegio.
texts.en: At 50, Digna is a hardworking woman. She is married and has five daughters, of which three live with her at home. Digna’s husband earns a living as a mason. Digna says that she supported her daughters through agriculture and raising livestock which is why she needs a loan to buy a dairy cow. Selling milk will raise her income for her daughters to attend school.

loans.use: to purchase a cow

loans.name: Orlando Daniel

texts.es: Orlando es un joven alegre y muy trabajador, tiene 25 años de edad, tiene una hija de 3 años de edad, Orlande se dedica a la agricultura a la ganadería y trabajar al jornal, Orlando vive en la casa de sus padres, Orlando necesita el crédito para invertir en la compra de  terneros ya que comenta que es bueno tener ganado para mejorar sus negocios, lo que Orlando aspira es seguir trabajando y seguir siendo responsable con su hija.
texts.en: Orlando is a young, cheerful, and hardworking 25-year-old. He has a three-year-old daughter. Orlando earns his living through agriculture, raising livestock, and wage work. Orlando lives in his parents’ home. He needs a loan to invest in buying calves. He says that it is good to have livestock to improve his business. Orlando aspires to continue working and remain responsible for his daughter.

loans.use: to invest in calves

loans.name: Francisco Xavier

texts.es: Xavier esta casado y tiene 31 años de edad, tiene una hija de 12 años y asiste a la escuela, su esposa se dedica a trabajar al jornal,  Xavier se dedica a la agricultura y a la crianza de animales, con el dinero del crédito Xavier va a comprar chanchos, la aspiracion de Xavier es de mejorar su negocio y darle bienestar a su hija y su meta es comprarse una casita pequeña junto a su esposa.
texts.en: Xavier is married and 31 years old. He has a 12 year old daughter who is in school. His wife is a day laborer. Xavier works in agriculture and in raising animals. With the money from the loan, Xavier is going to buy pigs. Xavier aspires to improving his business and give his daughter well-being. His goal is to buy a little house with his wife.

loans.use: to buy pigs.

loans.name: Roziya

texts.ru:
Розия вместе с семьей живет на районе Шахритус. Ей 46 лет. Розия мать четверых детей, к сожалению, ее муж скончался, после смерти мужа ей нелегко было прожить и расти детей одна. Сейчас ее старший сын находится за границей, он зарабатывает на жизнь и помогает родным. Один из сыновей студент и учится в городе Душанбе в Педагогическом институте. Младшие дети учатся в средней школе в родном районе. 
Розия занимается растениеводством на своем земельном участке. Она начала заниматься этим бизнесом 7 лет назад. Ей в работе помогают ее дети после учебы. Это деятельность является основным, и доход от этого бизнеса обеспечивает семью. Сейчас она готовится к посеву нового урожая, у нее недостаточно денежных средств, чтобы купить качественные семена картофеля и минеральные удобрение, по этой причине она обратилась за кредитом, чтобы получать качественный урожай. Ваш кредит поможет ей расширить деятельность и постепенно улучшить условия жизни семьи. Она надеется на Вашу помощь и доброту.
texts.en:
Roziya lives with her family in the Shahrituz district of Tajikistan.  She is 46 years old and the mother of four children.  Unfortunately, her husband passed away, and Roziya has had a very difficult time coping and raising her children by herself after her husband's death.  Her oldest son is now making a living abroad and helping the rest of the family.  Her second son is a student at the Pedagogical Institute in Dushanbe.  Her youngest two children are still in secondary school in their native district.

Roziya grows crops on her own parcel of land. She started this activity seven years ago.  Her youngest children help her after school.  This farming activity is the family's main source of income.  Roziya is now planning to sow her land for the next harvest, but she doesn't have enough money to buy high-quality potato seeds and mineral fertilizers.  For this reason, she has applied for a loan, which will help her to get a good harvest.  By lending to Roziya, you will help her to expand her activity and to gradually improve her family's living conditions.  Roziya is looking forward to your support and kindness.

loans.use: to buy potato seeds and fertilizers.

loans.name: Juan Carlos

texts.es:
El joven Juan Carlos  vive en Managua, trabaja desde hace tres años en una institución del estado   se caracteriza por ser una persona responsable en su trabajo y con su familia.
Juan Carlos solicitud  crédito para invertirlo en la compra de materiales de construcción como perlines, zin,  para la reparación del techo para mejorar las condiciones y comodidades de su familia.
A la vez nos manifiesta que se siente muy agradecido porque gracias a este crédito que le han financiado va hacer la mejora de su casa para darle mayor seguridad a sus seres queridos.
texts.en:
Juan Carlos lives in Managua, and has worked for the past three years for a government agency. Juan is young, but his family, friends, and colleagues know him as an upstanding employee, colleague, and family man. 

Juan Carlos is applying for a loan for the purchase of construction materials he needs for a home improvement project, such as purlines and zinc for roof repairs. This project will allow his family to live in more comfortable conditions. 

Juan Carlos is is extremely grateful because this loan will finance the improvements to his home that will provide greater security to his loved ones.

loans.use: to purchase construction materials.

loans.name: Rosa Anabel

texts.es: Rosa de 34 años de edad vive en casa propia con su grupo familiar, ella se dedica a la venta de tortillas desde hace 5 años, Rosa quiere mejorar su vivienda construyendo las paredes y encementando el piso, pero como no tiene de suficiente capital, ella esta solicitando nuevamente un crédito pero esta vez es para la compra de ladrillos, arena, cemento, hierro y pago de mano de obra para que ella y su familia puedan vivir ms seguros y cómodos.
texts.en:
Rosa is 34 years old, and lives with her family in a home that she owns. She has for the past five years sold tortillas to earn a living. 

Rosa would like to make improvements to her home: the installation of walls and a cement floor. She doesn't have the funds, however, to pay for the materials and labor, so she's applying for another loan. She will use the loan funds to purchase bricks, sand, cement, and iron, and to pay laborers, The loan thus represents the opportunity to make these home improvements and thus provide her family a safer and more comfortable home.

loans.use: for the purchase of bricks, sand, cement, and iron, and to pay laborers.

loans.name: Zuurakan

texts.ru: Зууракан 55 лет, замужем, мать 5 детей. У Зууракан среднее образование, на протяжении 24 лет занимается полеводством и животноводством, у нее развитое хозяйство. Зууракан на пенсии, ее супруг работает учителем в школе. Ежемесячная совокупная прибыль составляет около 18,800 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Зууракан обратилась в Банк «Бай – Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 50,000 сом (KGS) на покупку телят для откорма и перепродажи. Доходы Зууракан планирует вложить в дальнейшее увеличение поголовья скота, а в будущем планирует построить новый дом для ее семьи.
texts.en: Zuurakan is 55 years old, married, and the mother of five children.  She has a secondary education and she has been involved in agriculture and animal husbandry for the past 24 years.  She has a well-developed farming business.  Each month, she makes a total income of about 18,800 som (KGS).  In order to further grow her business, she has turned to Bai Tushum Bank CJSC and applied for a loan of 50,000 som (KGS) to buy calves for fattening and resale.  She is planning to use her earnings to further increase her cattle headcount. In the future, she would also like to build a new house for her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional calves in order to increase her livestock headcount.

loans.name: Diego Armando

texts.es: Diego es un joven trabajador de 22 años de edad, vive en el campo con sus padres y son ellos  quienes les enseñan a ser trabajador y a ser un joven de bien, Diego  se dedica  a trabajar al jornal y a la crianza de animales, el dinero del crédito lo necesita para  comprar chanchos, la aspiración de este joven salir adelante mediante su esfuerzo y segur ahorrando.
texts.en: Diego is a young 22-year-old worker. He lives in the country with his parents who taught him to be industrious and to be a good man. Diego earns his living as a wage worker and raising animals. He needs the money from a loan to buy pigs. His aspiration is to progress through his efforts and continue saving money.

loans.use: to purchase pigs

loans.name: Antonio Vicente

texts.es: Antonio de 54 años de edad vive en casa propia con su grupo familiar, el posee un taller de estructuras metálicas y con lo que obtiene de su trabajo logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, el quiere mejorar su vivienda construyendo un muro en el lugar que muestra la fotografía, pero no tiene de suficiente capital para realizarlo por esa razón solicita un crédito para la compra de cemento, ladrillos, arena, hierro y pago de mano de obra para que el y su familia puedan vivir mas cómodos.
texts.en:
Antonio is 54 years old. He lives in a home of his own with his family. 

He has a workshop to build metal structures, and he is able to pay for some of the expenses in his home with what he earns from his work. He wants to improve his home by building a wall in the place that he is showing in the photo, but he does not have enough capital to do so.

He is requesting a loan to purchase cement, bricks, sand, iron and to pay for labor so that he and his family can live more comfortably.

loans.use: to purchase cement, bricks, sand, iron and to pay for labor.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase grazing cattle.

loans.name: Catarina

texts.es:
Catarina es una mujer de 31 años de edad, ella vive junta a su hermosa familia en una comunidad de Nahuala 
Catarina es una madre que trabaja duro para apoyar a su esposo con los ingresos económicos, ella lo hace con el propósito de que su hijo viva mejor,  Catarina es una mujer que aprovecha su tiempo, ella se levanta muy temprano para realizar sus oficios domésticos, y en el transcurso del día se dedica a tejer ella elabora güipiles en telar de cintura, pues ella con el primer prestamo que tuvo en ADICLA  se propuso ser más creativo con su trabajo,  para generar más ingresos y poder pagar en primer prestamo, y ahora cuenta con mucha clientela,  y este le motiva a buscar un prestamo más que ahora le servirá para remodela su cocina,  ya que un lugar donde prepara sus alimentos y debe ser un lugar más adecuado e higiénico, para la buena salud de su familia, como expresa  Catarina que con lo que genera con sus tejidos estaría pagando el segundo prestamo. 
Catarina manifiesta que con esfuerzo y dedicación se logra alcanzar los sueños, pues ella más adelante quiere implementar un molino de nixtamal para más ingresos económicos  y poyar a su hijo a seguir estudiando hasta ser profesional
texts.en:
Catarina is 31 years old. She lives with her beautiful family in a community in Nahuala. Catarina is a mother who works hard to support her husband with income. She works so that her son may live better. 

Catarina uses her time well. She wakes up very early to be able to do her domestic chores, and throughout the day she works sewing, making woven blouses using a loom. With the first loan that she received in ADICLA, she set out to be more creative with her work to earn more income and to be able to pay for the first loan. Now, she has many more clients which motivates her to look for another loan that will help her to remodel her kitchen. She says that the place where she prepares her food should be more appropriate and more hygienic for her family's health. Catarina says that she will pay for the second loan with the income from her weaving. 

Catarina says that she reaches her dreams with hard work and dedication. Later, she wants to install a corn mill to earn more income to support her son so that he may continue going to school until he has a degree.

loans.use: to remodel the kitchen.

loans.name: Catarina

texts.es:
Catarina es una mujer que lucha para  progresar con su familia, ella vive en la comunidad de  Guineales es casada tiene un hijo de 6 años  y ella tiene 25 años. 
Catarina para la generación de sus ingresos económicos, ella cuenta con una tienda de abarrotes y consumo diario, esta tienda lo instalo desde hace 6 años,  la  experiencia  lo obtuvo con su esposo, ya que él también se dedica a la misma actividad,
 pues lo que manifiesta Catarina es que  le va bien en su negocio y si le genera ganancias; pero esto no es suficiente para cubrir todas las necesidades de una familia, Para poder lograr y alcanzar otras metas es necesario buscar otros medios. Pues dentro del plan de Catarina es comprar una cuerda de terreno que más adelante le servirá para construir su casa, a raíz de esta necesidad ella busca un prestamo de diez mil quetzales para realizar esta compra, y con las ganancias de su negocio estaría pagando el prestamo tal como lo establece el plan de pago, la ventaja de los prestamos es que se va pagando poco a poco y esto le facilita a la persona ir reuniendo mensualmente su cuota de pago. El sueño de Catarina es conseguir el prestamo.
texts.en:
Catarina is a woman who fights to get her family ahead. She lives in the community of Guineales, and she is married with one 6 year-old son. She is 25 years old. To earn an income, Catarina has a general grocery story, which she began 6 years ago. She gained experience with her husband, because he too works in the store. Catarina says that her business is going well and earns an income for her, but it is not enough to cover all of her family's necessities.

In order to reach other goals, she needs to look for other methods. Catarina's plan is to purchase approximately one acre of land that she can later use to build her house. To do this, she is looking for a loan of ten thousand quetzales to purchase it. She will pay for the loan using the income from her store, as is set out in the payment plan. The advantage of the loan is that she can pay it little by little, and this makes it easier for a person to collect the payment quota monthly.

Catarina's goal is to receive a loan.

loans.use: to purchase land.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: buy fish and beverages.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase corn and firewood.

loans.name: Isaac

texts.es:
Isaac es una hombre de 54 años de edad, viudo, tiene 4 hijos de 30, 27, 25 y 23 años, y su negocio es la venta de carne de llama.
Él es emprendedor, independiente, buen padre, responsable y trabajador. Su negocio lo realiza en la comunidad ‘Colquemaya’ que se encuentra ubicado en cercanías al lago sagrado Titicaca, área agrícola dónde se cría ganado; camélido, vacuno, ovino y porcino, se vive de la pesca, carne y también de vegetales, tubérculos y cereales del lugar, como la quinua, el chuño, la haba, la papa, etc., de clima frío y seco; con una temperatura que varía durante el día entre 1-12 grados centígrados, donde los rayos solares golpean con mucha fuerza la superficie.
Isaac es de tez morena, cabello negro, de baja estatura, su lengua materna es el Aymará que se habla en el lugar y habla español por cultura general, su vida la realiza con su hijo menor que se dedica al mismo negocio, viven en una casa propia construida de adobe, ladrillo y cuenta con agua de pozo y electricidad. Su negocio es la venta de carne de llama; esta carne tiene un mayor contenido de proteínas en relación con otras carnes (res, pollo, credo), y el bajo contenido de su grasa no ayuda a la formación de colesterol, es sana ya que no tiene ninguna enfermedad contagiosa que pueda poner en peligro la salud humana, y es muy popular la elaboración de charque de llama que consisten en el salado y deshidratación de esta. “la carne de llama es muy rica, y es parte de nuestra agricultura …” comenta. Actualmente no cuenta con sierra cortadora de carne, realiza el trabajo de forma manual con un cuchillo y una pequeña hacha, en el patio de su casa, a pesar de eso sus clientes son fieles y constantes. Su sueño es tener una carnicería amplia y desea realizar la compra de una sierra cortadora de carne para proveer del producto con mayor higiene. Esta es la 1 secuencia de préstamos con la institución en 6 años que viene realizando esta actividad.
Es por esos motivos que Isaac solicita un préstamo para la compra de una sierra cortadora de carne para vender carne de llama por mayor.
texts.en:
Isaac is a 54-year-old widower. He has 4 children, ages 30, 27, 25 and 23. He has a business selling llama meat. He is enterprising, independent, a good father, responsible and hard working. 

His business is in the community of Colquemaya, located near the sacred Lake Titicaca. This is an agricultural area where they raise livestock: llamas, cattle, sheep and pigs. Fish, meat, and vegetables, tubers and grains from the region such as quinoa, freeze dried potato, broad beans and potatoes etc. are all consumed. The climate is cold and dry with a temperature that varies throughout the day from 1-12 degrees Celsius, when the sun’s rays shine powerfully on the land.

Isaac is dark-skinned and of short stature, with black hair. His native tongue is Aymara, which is spoken locally, and he speaks Spanish, which is widely spoken. He lives with his youngest son who works in the same business. They live in their own home, which is built of adobe and brick, and has well water and electricity.

His business is selling llama meat. This meat is higher in protein than other meats like beef, chicken, and pork. It has a low fat content, and doesn’t contribute to raising cholesterol. It is healthful since it has no contagious diseases that can endanger human health. Jerky made by dehydrating and salting llama meat is very popular. “Llama meat is very delicious, and it’s part of our agriculture…” he says.

Currently, he does not have a meat saw. He works by hand, on the patio at his house, using a knife and a small axe. In spite of this his customers are loyal and steady. 

His dream is to have a spacious butcher shop, and he hopes to buy a meat saw to provide his product more hygienically. This is the first loan cycle with the institution in the 6 years he’s been doing this.

This is why Isaac is asking for a loan to buy a meat saw to sell llama meat wholesale.

loans.use: to buy a meat saw in order to sell llama meat wholesale.

loans.name: Juan Carlos

texts.es:
Juan Carlos ha ido ganando poco a poco el título de uno de los mejores agricultores de frijol, maíz, tomate y tabaco. Desde hace mucho tiempo lleva invirtiendo créditos para hacer de sus cosechas las mejores. Por esta razón, este hombre ejemplar de 35 años de edad, padre soltero de un hijo, se siente muy agradecido con MiCrédito, KIVA y con todas las personas que le han apoyado con el préstamo anterior, con el cual no solo invirtió en fertilizantes, insecticidas y pagó mano de obra, sino que también pudo hasta comprar equipo de riego y bombas para fumigar para obtener excelentes cultivos. 
Ahora un nuevo ciclo de cultivos se acerca, por lo que es hora de solicitar un nuevo préstamo para comprar insecticidas, fungicidas, fertilizantes y pagar mano de obra para la siguiente cosecha de tabaco. Con este equipo podrá obtener un resultado de calidad y tendrá ingresos que le asegurarán seguir mejorando su estilo de vida e ir ampliando su vivienda. Al cancelar considera seguir trabajando en sus hortalizas, pues es su principal fuente de ingresos para él y para su familia.
texts.en:
Juan Carlos has been slowly earning the title of one of the best bean, corn, tomato and tobacco farmers. He has been investing loans to make his harvests the best for a long time. This is why this exemplary man, who is a single father of one son, is very grateful for MiCrédito, Kiva, and for all of the people who have been supporting him with his previous loan. He did not just invest his previous loan in fertilizers, insecticides and to pay for labor, but he also was able to purchase irrigation equipment and pumps to fumigate so that he can have excellent crops. 

Now, a new crop cycle is getting closer, which is why it is time to request a new loan to purchase insecticides, fungicides, fertilizers and to pay for labor for the next tobacco crop.

With this equipment, he will be able to have high-quality results and will have income that will ensure that he can continue improve his life and expanding his home. After paying back the loan, he will continue working on his crops, because they are his and his family's main source of income.

loans.use: to purchase insecticides, fungicides, fertilizers and to pay for labor.

loans.name: Orfa Maria

texts.es: A sus 35 años de edad Maria es madre soltera, tiene 4 hijos de las edades de 18, 13, 9 y de 3 años y están estudiando, también esta criando a una niña de 6 meses, comenta que hace 5 meses atrás se dedicaba a vender comida y una clienta le dejo a una niña abandonada y lo mas triste de esto es que la niña tiene capacidad especial, en la actualidad Maria se dedica  a la venta de ropa en el poco tiempo libre que le queda, el crédito lo va a invertir en la compra de ropa para conseguir algo de ingresos ya que es muy duro correr con los gastos de todos sus hijos, y su aspiración es hacerle curar a la niña de la que esta hecho a cargo.
texts.en:
Maria, aged 35, is a single mother. She has four children—aged 18, 13, 9, and 3—who go to school, and she is also raising a six-month-old girl.

She mentions that five months ago, she was working selling food, and a girl was left with her—abandoned by one of her customers. The saddest aspect of this is that the girl has special needs. 

Currently, Maria sells clothes in what little free time she has. She will use the loan to buy clothes to generate some income since it is very hard to cover her children's expenses.

She wishes for the girl in her charge to get better.

loans.use: to buy clothes.

loans.name: José Ramiro

texts.es:
José, de 43 años de edad, está soltero, pero tiene una hija, la cual ya formo su propio hogar, actualmente vive solo.

José, ha trabajado toda su vida como agricultor en la tierra que le heredaron sus padres, de esta manera ha vivido tranquilamente en su cantón.

José, necesita el crédito para comprar un sistema de riego para sus cultivos, él quiere actualizarse un poco con las nuevas técnicas de agricultura y por esta razón, quiere colocarlo en sus cultivos de hortalizas.

José, sueña con convertirse en un productor fuerte en su zona y abastezca los principales mercados de los pueblos cercanos.
texts.en:
43 year old José is single but has a daughter who has already set-up her own home. He currently lives alone.
José has worked as a farmer all his life, working the land that he inherited from his parents. He has always lived quietly like this in his village.
José needs a loan to buy an irrigation system for his crops. He wants to modernize and use some new agricultural technologies and so he wants to install this in his fields.
José dreams of becoming a significant producer and supplying the principle markets in the surrounding towns.

loans.use: to buy an irrigation system for his crops.

loans.name: María Antonia

texts.es:
María, de 44 años de edad, es comerciante desde muy joven, actualmente está casada y tiene una hija; su esposo trabaja como albañil, en trabajos de construcción.

María, vende productos de primera necesidad como azúcar, café, aceite, arroz, sopas instantáneas, golosinas, entre otros artículos.

El préstamo lo necesita para comprar dulces, bebidas, cuadernos, lapiceros, borradores, entre otros, porque quiere aprovechar que su negocio, está cerca de una escuela y como ya inicio el año escolar, los alumnos compran en su tienda.

María, tiene el sueño de colocar un mini-súper, donde pueda ofrecer más variedad de productos.
texts.en:
44 year old María has been a businesswoman since she was very young. She is currently married and has a daughter. Her husband works as a mason, doing construction jobs. 
María sells staple goods such as sugar, coffee, oil, rice, soups, instant mixes, candy, and other times. She needs the loan to buy candy, drinks, notebooks, pencils, erasers, and other items. She takes advantage of the fact that her business is close to a school and, as the school year has already started, the students are shopping in her store. 
She needs the loan to buy candy, drinks, notebooks, pencils, erasers and other times 
María dreams of having a mini-mart where she can sell a greater variety of products.

loans.use: to buy candy, drinks, notebooks, pencils, erasers, and other items.

loans.name: Mario Jose

texts.es:
Mario, de 24 años de edad, estudio hasta bachillerato, está soltero y actualmente vive con su madre, a quien apoya con los gastos del hogar.

Mario, se desempeña desde hace 5 años, en el área de venta de celulares de toda marca, se levanta muy temprano para ofrecer ese producto y cumplir con sus metas diarias.

El préstamo lo necesita, para colocar su propio negocio de venta de celulares, ya que se quiere asociar con otra persona, para compartir los gastos.

El sueño de Mario, es estudiar en una universidad, la carrera de enfermería.
texts.en:
24 year old Mario studied through his baccalaureate. He is single and currently lives with his mother, whom he helps with the household expenses. 
For 5 years, Mario has been working in the field of cellphone sales, selling all models. He gets up very early to sell his goods and to meet his daily goals. 
He needs the goal to set-up his own store selling cellphones as he wants to go-in with another person to share the costs. 
Mario's dream is to study nursing in the university.

loans.use: to supply his cellphone store.

loans.name: Erick Fernando

texts.es:
Erick, de 28 años de edad, es un joven muy trabajador, vive con sus y dos hermanos, uno de los dos hermanos es mecánico, el otro motorista y sus padres solo se dedican al oficio del hogar.

Erick, tiene varios años de trabajar en una empresa desempañando el cargo de operador de máquinas, ya que posee un gran espíritu de aprendizaje, logró adaptarse a la tecnología y es así como se mantiene  laborando en dicha empresa.  

El dinero del préstamo lo necesita para reparar el techo de su vivienda, ya que está un poco dañado y necesita repararlo, antes que llegue el invierno. 

Erick, quiere arreglar y ampliar más su casa, ya que piensa casarse pronto.
texts.en:
28 year old Erick is a very hardworking young man. He lives with his 2 brothers - one of his brothers is a mechanic and the other is a driver, and his parents work only in the home.
Erick has been working for some time operating machines for a company. As he has a great spirit of learning, he has been able to figure out the technology and this is how he keeps working at this business. 
He needs the money from this loan to repair the roof of his house as it is a little damaged and he needs to fix it before the winter comes. 
Erick wants to repair and extend his house as he is thinking of getting married soon.

loans.use: to repair the roof of his house.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy construction materials to improve his quality of life

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy cement, iron, and bricks and pay for labor to build a kitchen.

loans.name: Rosa Angelica

texts.es:
Rosa Angélica  es una señorita de 19 años de edad, ella vive en una comunidad de Guineales junto a sus padres y hermanos.
Rosa Angélica con la ayuda de sus padres tuvo la oportunidad de estudiar y obtuvo el título de profesora, pero por ahora ella aún no está ejerciendo su profesión,   Rosa para poder ejercer su profesión  debe de hacer otras gestiones con el Ministerio de Educación que es el ente encargado de  realizar la contratación.

Rosa trabaja ahora como ama de casa ayudando a su mamá en los oficios de la casa, ella para generar sus ingresos se dedica a realizar tejidos  y las piezas los comercializa en el mercado de Guineales lugar donde ella vive, este oficio lo viene desempeñando desde hace 2 años, pues Rosa es una señorita que piensa en su futuro, su primera meta es comprar un terreno para que más adelante tenga un espacio donde construir su casa, pues con esa idea ella está buscando un prestamo de siete mil quetzales para poder comprarse un terreno y con lo que genera de sus tejidos ella estaría pagando el prestamo. 
El sueño más grande de Rosa es luchar para conseguir una contratación para ejercer su profesión y devengar un mejor ingreso económico.
texts.en:
Rosa Angélica is a 19 year old young woman. She lives in the community of Guineales along with her parents and siblings. 
Rosa Angélica, with the help of her parents, had the opportunity to study and earn the title of teacher. However, she is not in this profession at the moment. In order to be a teacher, Rosa needs to make arrangements with the Ministry of Education, which is the entity that is charged with making the contract. 
Rosa is currently working as a housewife, helping her mother in the house. To generate some income, she weaves and sells her pieces in the market in Guineales (where she lives). She has been doing this for 2 years. Rosa is a woman who thinks of the future and her main goal is to buy some land so that, later on, she will have somewhere to build a house. With this idea in mind, she is seeking a loan of $925 so she can buy some land and she will repay the loan with the income from her weaving .
Rosa's greatest dream is to get a contract so that she can teach and earn a better living.

loans.use: to buy land.

loans.name: Julio Cesar

texts.es: Julio de 55 años de edad vive en casa propia con sus tres hijos, el se dedica desde hace varios años a la agricultura siembra maíz y frijol y vende sus productos en los diferentes mercados que se encuentran cerca de su casa, el está solicitando un crédito para la compra de fertilizantes, abonos, controles de plagas, herbicidas y mejorar el terreno que muestra la fotografía para continuar con su trabajo y asi tener mejores ingresos.
texts.en: Julio, 55 years old, lives in his own home with his three children. He has worked in agriculture for several years, planting corn and beans. He sells his produce in the various markets located close to his home. He is requesting a loan to buy manure, fertilizers, pest controls and herbicides and to improve the land shown in the photo to continue with his work and in that way to have a higher income.

loans.use: to buy manure, fertilizers, pest controls and herbicides and to improve the land.

loans.name: Ruth Noemi

texts.es:
La familia es el núcleo de un hogar, esta se debe forjar y cuidar con mucho amor y valores. Sin embargo, en muchos casos la economía no es suficiente para la manutención de un hogar, es ahí donde ambos cónyuges se ven obligados a trabajar fuera de este. Ruth es consciente de que los hijos necesitan la figura de los padres, por esto se animó a poner una pulpería en su casa, para no descuidarlos y apoyar de esta forma los gastos del día a día.  

Ruth solicita el financiamiento para surtir la pulpería con arroz, frijoles, café, golosinas y demás. También, planea invertir en más productos de la temporada, para  que su pulpería satisfaga la creciente demanda de sus clientes, pues es la única a su alrededor. Ella espera seguir creciendo y aportando a su hogar por el bien de sus hijos.
texts.en:
The family is the nucleus of a household. It must be shaped and watched over with great love and values. Nevertheless, in many cases the economy is not sufficient for the support of a household. This is where both partners find themselves obligated to work outside the home. Ruth is conscious that her children need the parental figures. For this reason she was inspired to set up a grocery store in their house, so that she wouldn't neglect them and in this way she could support the daily expenses.

Ruth is applying for the loan to stock the grocery store with rice, beans, coffee, candies, and other items. In addition, she plans to invest in more seasonal products so that her grocery store will satisfy the growing demand of her customers, since it is the only one in her area. She hopes to continue growing and supporting her household for the good of her children.

loans.use: to stock her grocery store with rice, beans, coffee, candies, and other items.

loans.name: Jose Rogelio

texts.es:
Rogelio, de 44 años de edad, está casado y su esposa se dedica a los oficios domésticos y hace productos derivados de la leche, tiene 4 hijos, de los cuales 3 estudian y una señorita de 20 años de edad, ayuda con los quehaceres del hogar.

Rogelio, siembra maíz y frijol, su fuerte es la ganadería, ya que cuenta con 6 vacas lecheras y es de ese rubro que mantiene a toda su familia. 

El dinero lo necesita para comprar una vaca más para su hijo, ya que quiere que también tenga su propio ganado y así pueda prepararse para el futuro. 

Rogelio, quiere que sus hijos sean buenos ganaderos y tengan su propio ganado, para que puedan tener sus propios ingresos.
texts.en:
Rogelio, who is 44 years old, is married. His wife does the household tasks and makes products derived from milk. He has four children, of whom three are in school, and a daughter who is 20 years old helps with the household duties.

Rogelio plants corn and beans. His strength is raising livestock, since he has six milk cows, and it is from this area that he supports his entire family.

He needs the money to buy one more cow for his son, since he wants him to also have his own livestock, and in this way he can prepare himself for the future.

Rogelio want his children to be good cattle farmers and have their own livestock so that they can have their own income.

loans.use: to buy a cow for his son.

loans.name: Luis Alberto

texts.es:
Luis, de 33 años de edad, está casado, su esposa se dedica a los oficios domésticos y a cuidar a sus hijos y es padre de 2 hijos.

Luis, tiene varios años de dedicarse a soldar y siempre tiene trabajos entre familiares, amigos y personas que lo recomienda.- Además, se asocia con amigos albañiles para tomar trabajos que requieren de varias personas.

El préstamo lo necesita para comprar hierro y terminar varios trabajos que tiene pendientes y quiere terminarlos antes del mes de Febrero.

El sueña con colocar su propio taller de soldar.
texts.en:
Luis, who is 33 years old, is married. His wife does the domestic tasks and cares for their children. He is the father of two children.

Luis has done soldering work for a number of years. He always has work from relatives, friends, and people who recommend him. In addition, he works together with friends who are masons to take on work that requires several people.

He needs the loan to buy iron and finish a number of projects that are pending, and he wants to finish them before the month of February.

He dreams of setting up his own soldering workshop.

loans.use: to buy iron.

loans.name: Francisco

texts.es:
Francisco es un hombre casado de 40 años, él tiene una hermosa familia de 4 hijos, todos ellos viven en una comunidad de Xejuyup. 
Francisco es un hombre que trabajo con mucho esfuerzo, por su responsabilidad que tiene con su familia, hace diez años él adquirió una bonita experiencia de trabajo  con sus amigos, pues Francisco ahora trabaja como albañil, es un oficio que le encanta hacer,  aparte de generar sus ingresos él también se siente muy útil para la sociedad, por los años de trabajo que él lleva es una persona muy conocida por su comunidad y lugares aledaños, de esta manera Francisco ha sacado adelante y seguirá sacando adelante a sus hijos, la meta de este señor es que sus hijos estudien hasta llegar hacer profesionales, además de apoyarles con él estudio, Francisco necesita comprar lotes de terreno para que cuando sus hijos sean mayores puede tener cada quien su lote. 
Con esa meta Francisco necesita ahora un prestamo para comprar un terreno ya que se le está presentando una oportunidad, pues lo que él necesita son diez mil quetzales,  el anhelo de Francisco es conseguir el prestamo para que pueda lograr lo deseado.
texts.en:
Francisco is 40 years old, and he is married. He has a beautiful family with four children, and they all live in a community in Xejuyup.

Francisco works very hard because of the responsibility that he has with his family. Ten years ago, he got nice work experience with his friends, and now Francisco works as a mason, which is work that he loves doing. Besides earning an income, he also feels as though he is contributing to society. Because of how long he has worked, he is a very well-known person in his community and in surrounding areas. Francisco has gotten ahead this way, and he will continue to get his children head.

Francisco's goal is that his children may continue studying until they get degrees. Besides supporting them with their studies, Francisco needs to purchase lots of land so that he may have a lot for each of his children when they are older. To reach this dream, Francisco needs a loan to purchase land. With this opportunity, Francisco needs ten thousand quetzales. Francisco's dream is to get the loan so that he can reach what he wishes for.

loans.use: to purchase land.

loans.name: Siempre Unidos Group

texts.es:
Los socios pertenecen al banco comunal “SIEMPRE UNIDOS”; Este banco se ubicada en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Yenny Margot ella es soltera y tiene 38 años y tiene 2 hijos; La socia trabaja en su negocio negocio de venta de comida,ella tiene un restaurant, la socia por medio de este negocio quiere salir adelante, la socia hace platos como pollo al horno, sopas entre otros, el sueño de la socia es ampliar su negocio de venta de comida. La socia solicita el crédito para comprar verduras, pollo y carne.
El socio que esta pegada a la foto grupal se le tomo la foto despues de la reunion porque pidio permiso por motivos de trabajo.

Los otros socios se dedican al negocio de venta de ropa, negocio de venta de comida, negocio de tienda de abarrotes y negocio de venta de artesanía.

La socia agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
The members belong to the "SIEMPRE UNIDOS" (forever united) community bank. This bank is located in the district of Cusco, belonging to the province of Cusco and the department of Cusco. 

The member is Yenny Margot. She is single, and is 38 years old and she has 2 children. She works in her business selling food; she has a restaurant. She wants to get ahead with her business. She prepares dishes such as baked chicken and soup, among others. Her dream is to expand her business selling food. She is requesting the loan to purchase vegetables, chicken and meat. 

The member who is attached to the group photo had his photograph taken after the meeting because he had to miss because of work. 

The other members work selling clothing, food, with grocery store businesses, and selling handicrafts. Yenny thanks thanks those who are part of her dream through these means, and she promises to make her payments within the established period.

loans.use: to purchase vegetables, chicken and meat.

loans.name: Benicio

texts.es:
Benicio tiene 48 años de edad, tiene hogar estable al lado de su cónyuge y su hijo, vive en casa propia de material rústico en la parte rural del distrito de Pimpingos, ubicado en la provincia de Cutervo, región Cajamarca, en la sierra norte de Perú. La población del distrito se dedica a la agricultura, ganadería y comercio.

El se dedica a la crianza y comercialización de ganado vacuno (vacas), actividad que realiza desde hace 14 años. Adicionalmente es profesor en un colegio del distrito. Cuenta con muy buenas referencias personales y laborales en la zona. El destino del crédito será para la compra de una mayor cantidad de ganado vacuno así como para brindar mantenimiento al lugar donde los cría (corrales). Con esto Benicio espéra incrementar su nivel de ingresos y por ende mejorará su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Benicio is 48 years old and he has a stable home with his partner and their son. He lives in a home of his own made out of rustic materials in the rural part of the district of Pimpingos, located in the province of Cutervo, in the region of Cajamarca in the northern highlands of Peru. The population in this district works in agriculture, cattle and commerce.

He works raising and selling cattle (cows), which he has done for 14 years. He is also a teacher in a school in the district. He has very good personal and professional references in the area.

He will use the credit to purchase more cattle as well as to maintain the corral where he raises them. With this, Benicio hopes to increase his income and be able to improve his quality of life and that of his family.

loans.use: to purchase more cattle as well as to maintain the corrals where he raises them.

loans.name: Dora Esmeralda

texts.es:
Dora, se dispone a resurtir el inventario de la tienda y necesita un nuevo crédito para poder comprar jugos, gaseosas, boquitas, pan, huevos, granos básicos, etc., busca cubrir las demandas de sus clientes y mantener su fuente de ingresos.
Los financiamientos le han dado recursos económicos para ofertar productos varios en la tienda y lograr la satisfacción de sus clientes, comenta que está teniendo cambios positivos en el estilo de vida familiar.
texts.en:
Dora replenishes the store's inventory and needs a new loan to be able to purchase juice, sodas, snacks, bread, eggs, basic grains, etc. to cover the demands of her clients and to maintain her source of income. 

The loans have given herthe  economic resources to offer various products in her store and to satisfy her clients. She comments that she is seeing positive changes in her family's lifestyle.

loans.use: to purchase juice, sodas, snacks, bread, eggs, basic grains, etc. to cover the demands of her clients and to maintain her source of income.

loans.name: José Emilio

texts.es:
José, de 50 años de edad, estudio hasta cuarto grado en la escuelita de su comunidad, es padre de tres hijos, está casado y su esposa es ama de casa.- Su primer hijo estudio profesorado en ciencias sociales, en la universidad  nacional, la segunda hija estudio profesorado en educación parvulario y el tercer hijo, este año ingresará a la escuela nacional agrícola. 

José, tiene una hojalatería y tiene 24 años de dedicarse a este oficio, el aprendió tomando cursos con organizaciones privadas como el CENTA Y PRODEMOR, eso lo motivó a dedicarse a este oficio, ya que en la zona no hay muchos hojalateros y este negocio es rentable.- Anteriormente, él se dedicaba a la agricultura.

El crédito lo utilizará para comprar 18 láminas número 26, para elaborar silos metálicos, 4 libras de estaño para unir las piezas y una tijera para cortar lámina.
 
El sueño de José es, ayudarle en lo que este a su alcance, a su ultimo hijo para que termine sus estudios y que ellos puedan construir una vivienda digna y cómoda para sus familias.
texts.en:
José, who is 50 years old, went to school through fourth grade in the little school in his community. He is the father of three children. He is married and his wife is a housewife. His oldest son studied teacher training in social sciences at the national university. His daughter studied preschool education, and his youngest son will enter the national agricultural school this year.

José has a tinsmith shop, and he has worked in this area for 24 years. He learned by taking courses with private organizations such as CENTA and PRODEMOR. This motivated him to work in this field, since in the zone where he lives, there aren't many tinsmith shops and this business is profitable. Before that, he worked in agriculture.

He will use the loan to buy 18 number 26 metal sheets to make metal silos, 4 pounds of tin to join the pieces, and shears to cut the sheets.

José's dreams are to help his youngest son to the extent that he is able so that he can finish his education and to build a worthy and comfortable home for his family.

loans.use: to buy 18 number 26 metal sheets to make metal silos, 4 pounds of tin to join the pieces, and shears to cut the sheets.

loans.name: Heylin Beatriz

texts.es:
Heylin Beatriz  es una mujer apasionada, que se ha dedicado toda su vida a abrirse paso en el mundo del comercio. Ella empezó vendiendo ropa, zapatos y carteras de segunda mano de forma ambulante. Luego con sus ahorros compro más productos, ahora tiene una pequeña tienda la cual con su sacrificio y el de su mamá, que es inmigrante, mantiene abastecida. 
Ella es una mujer decidida en los negocios, posee muchas metas, que paso a paso planea cumplir. Heylin desea poder ofertar su mercadería a las ciudades más visitadas por turistas, pero para poder cumplir ese objetivo primero debe invertir en sus productos y volverse más estable, es por eso que ella ha solicitado la ayuda de Kiva a través de MiCrédito con un préstamo para adquirir cajas con ropa usada y a la vanguardia. Esto le hará crecer como comerciante y su negocio se verá más completo.
texts.en:
Heyling Beatriz is an enthusiastic woman, who has devoted her entire life to make her way in the world of commerce. She started as a street vendor, selling second-hand clothes, shoes, and wallets. Later on, she bought more products with her savings. Today she owns a small shop. Through her sacrifice and that of her mother, who is an immigrant, this shop is kept well stocked.

She is a very determined business woman. She has many goals, which she intends to achieve slowly but surely.

Heylin wishes to offer her merchandise in the cities that are most visited by tourists. However, in order to fulfil this objective, first she has to invest in her products and make her business more stable. For this reason, she has requested a loan from Kiva through MiCrédito to buy boxes of used and trendy clothes. This will allow her to grow as a merchant, and make her shop look well stocked.

loans.use: to buy used clothing.

loans.name: Ilcia Nohemy

texts.es:
Ilcia, de 21 años de edad, estudio hasta quinto grado, es soltera y vive junto a su madre.

Ilcia, trabaja como empleada doméstica desde hace 7 años, aprendió este oficio ya que su madre siempre le dice que es bueno saber todo acerca de los quehaceres del hogar, además, es la principal fuente de ingresos que ella tiene para brindarle ayuda a su madre, en los gastos del hogar, su lugar de trabajo está a una distancia de 2 kilómetros.

Con el crédito Ilcia, comprara lamina, chapas, entre otro tipo de materiales para la elaboración de una puerta y para cancelarle a la persona que se la instalará.- Además, quiere comprarle a su madre, algunos utensilios que necesita en la cocina.

El sueño de ella es, en un futuro hacer su casa, además pretende colocar una tienda de productos básicos, para el servicio de la comunidad donde vive.
texts.en:
Ilcia, who is 21 years old, studied until fifth grade. She is single and lives with her mother.

For the past 7 years, Ilcia has worked as a domestic employee. She learned this profession because her mother always tells her that it is good to know all there is to know about household tasks. Additionally, it is the primary source of income that she has to help her mother with the household expenses. Her workplace is 2 kilometers away. 

With the loan, Ilcia will buy metal sheets and plates, among other materials to build a door. She will also pay the person who will install it. Additionally, she wants to buy some utensils for her mother that she needs in the kitchen. 

Her dream is to, in the future, make her home. She also wants to start a store selling basic goods and serve the community where she lives.

loans.use: to buy metal sheets and plates, among other materials to build a door.

loans.name: Emiliano

texts.es:
Emiliano, de 43 años de edad, estudió hasta quinto grado, está casado y su esposa se dedica a los quehaceres del hogar, tiene cinco hijos, todos ellos aún están estudiando, todos dependen de él económicamente.

Emiliano, es fontanero desde hace siete años, pero ya hace cinco años que trabaja para la alcaldía municipal, prestando sus servicios de fontanero.- Él aprendió este oficio, porque fue un amigo quien le enseño como desempeñar esta tarea, el trabajo está bastante cerca de su vivienda y su horario es de 8:00 A.M a 3:30 P.M. 
Anteriormente, él se dedicaba a la siembra de granos básicos.

Emiliano, con el crédito comprara tres polines, 250 varillas y 500 tejas, para reparar el techo de su vivienda.- El financiamiento solventará la necesidad del techo que está en mal estado.
 
El sueña con ayudar a sus hijos en sus estudios y a un mediano o largo plazo sean todos profesionales.- Además  sueña con que cada uno de ellos tenga su propia vivienda.
texts.en:
Emiliano is 43 years old and is married. He studied through fifth grade, and his wife works as a housewife. He has five children; they are all still in school now, and they all depend on him economically. Emiliano has worked as a plumber for seven years, but he has worked for the municipal mayoralty as a plumber for the last five years. 

He learned this trade because a friend taught him how. His work is fairly close to his home, and his schedule is from 8:00 AM to 3:00 PM. Previously, he worked planting basic grains.

Emiliano will purchase three poles, 250 rods and 500 tiles to repair his home's roof with the loan. The financing will resolve his need for a roof, which is in a poor state. He dreams of being able to help his children in their studies, and that they may become professionals in the medium or long term. He also hopes that each one of them may have their own homes.

loans.use: to purchase three poles, 250 rods and 500 tiles to repair his home's roof.

loans.name: Municipal Group

texts.es:
Este grupo solidario, está integrado por 3 mujeres luchadoras (Mery Luz, Antonieta del Socorro y Flor de María) de la ciudad de Bilwi; se unieron hace 9 meses con el propósito de trabajar de manera solidaria para acceder a préstamos con Pana Pana, con el propósito de tener la oportunidad de mejorar sus pequeños negocios. Mery Luz vende nacatamal y también vende productos básicos, Antonieta tiene una carnicería que atiende con su esposo y Flor de María es vendedora de productos de belleza que ofrece por catálogo. Gracias al primer crédito que recibió de Pana Pana con financiamiento de KIVA, les permitió a cada una cumplir con sus objetivos y así comenzar a mejorar sus ingresos y resolver algunas necesidades básicas en sus hogares.
 
Mery Luz: Es la coordinadora del Grupo Solidario, es casada, tiene 30 años de edad, tiene cuatro hijos en edad escolar. Desde hace 2 años comenzó  con su pequeña pulpería  en el corredor de su vivienda con el objetivo de tener su propia fuente de ingresos y apoyar con los gastos del hogar. Su esposo es vendedor ambulante de helados. Está solicitando este préstamo para seguir incrementando el inventario de su pulpería, para poder vender más, atender a más personas y asi mejorar también sus ingresos para ir creciendo y poder asumir los gastos de educación de sus cuatro hijos. Su sueño es llegar a tener una casa cómoda construida con concreto.
texts.en:
This solidarity group consists of three determined women (Mery Luz, Antonieta del Socorro, and Flor de María) who are from the city of Bilwi. They joined together nine months ago in hopes of working together as a solidarity group and accessing loans from Pana Pana. Their goal was to have the opportunity to improve their small businesses. Mery Luz sells Nicaraguan tamales, but she also sells basic products. Antonieta has a butcher shop that she manages with her husband. Flor de María is a saleswoman who offers beauty products through catalogs. Thanks to the first Kiva loan they received from Pana Pana, they were able to meet their goals, begin improving their incomes, and take care of a few basic necessities at home.

Mery Luz is the coordinator of this solidarity group. She is 30 years old, married, and has four school-age children. Two years ago, she opened her small grocery store in the corridor of her home. Her goal was to have her own source of income so that she could help with the household expenses. Her husband is a traveling ice cream vendor. Mery Luz is requesting a loan so that she can continue to increase the inventory of her grocery store. This will allow her to sell more and serve more people. As a result, her earnings will grow and she will be able to cover the educational expenses of her four children. Her dream is to build a more comfortable house out of concrete.

loans.use: to buy basic grains, yogurts, bath soap, laundry soap, detergents, toilet paper, instant soups, and other products to sell.

loans.name: Neza

texts.en:
Neza is 60 years old, married and resident of Bato, Plaridel, Philippines. Her husband is a carpenter and a farmer. They have 5 adult-age children. 

Starting with capitalization of 4,000 PHP, she opened a sari-sari (general store) and was able to expand it with the help of Paglaum Cooperative. Aside from financial assistance, she was able to generate savings and enjoys the benefit given by the co-op. She became a member in January of 2011 and has taken out three loans. 

She is now applying for a 20,000 PHP loan to buy additional stock for her sari-sari store, particularly basic commodities.  In the future, she wants to own a mini-mart someday, and will be fully satisfied if she can renovate and expand her house.

loans.use: to buy additional stock for her sari-sari store.

loans.name: Lolita

texts.en: Lolita has a wide experience in farming. She has mastered banana farming activities from growing, caring, harvesting and earning income as well. Lolita has supported her husband doing this type of work.  As a farmer, Lolita has nurtured her membership with PMPC and has maintained a good repayment record. She knows she can always turn to the Cooperative for her financial needs. Recently, she applied for a loan to purchase fertilizers to have good results in healthier, heavier, and potentially higher-yielding harvest.  Someday, Lolita hopes to purchase more banana land to cultivate that will potentially add income for the family.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizers

loans.name: Neerwata 05 Sapone Group

texts.fr:
Mr NINDA représente le groupe  NEERWATA 05 SAPONE. Marié, il est père de 19 enfants.  Le plus  âgé a 35ans et le moins âgé a 01an.  06 vont à l’école et il a 13 personnes en charge.
Mr fait l’agriculture depuis 30ans. Il s’approvisionne dans ville de Ouagadougou.
