María would like to build a bathroom, in order to avoid getting infections for her and her family. With the requested amount, she will buy cement, sand, bricks, iron, and pay for labor costs necessary for the construction of a bathroom.

loans.use: to pay for cement, sand, bricks, iron, and labor costs for the construction of a bathroom.

loans.name: Walter Oswaldo

texts.es:
Walter, de 22 años de edad, estudió hasta bachillerato, luego empezó a estudiar en la universidad, pero por los escasos recursos económicos de sus padres no pudo continuar, vive con sus padres y ayuda a los gastos familiares.

Walter, se dedica a trabajar como empleado en el proyecto de agua potable de la comunidad , su trabajo es trasladar recibos de pago y otras actividades necesarias para el buen funcionamiento del proyecto de agua, esta oportunidad se la ofrecieron hace 3 años, después que dejo de estudiar, trabaja de lunes a sábado y tiene que trasladarse a todos los puntos de la comunidad.- 

Además, se dedica a trabajar y ayudar a su padre en el cultivo de 7,000 metros cuadrados de maíz y el cultivo de 7,000 metros cuadrados de ajonjolí, esto lo hace en época de invierno por las mañanas, ya que por las tardes tiene que terminar el trabajo en el proyecto de agua, los cultivos los tiene a 2 kilómetros de su casa. 

Los fondos del crédito serán destinados para comprar un buey, ya que los productos los tiene que transportar en su espalda y necesita el medio de transporte para trasladarlos.

Espera en un futuro comprar varios animales, ya que tienen donde poder alimentarlos y también, desea comprar un terreno donde pueda construir una vivienda, para formar su propia familia.
texts.en:
Walter, 22, studied through secondary school and then started his studies at university. However, because of his parents' limited economic means he was not able to continue. He lives with his parents and helps with the household expenses. 

Walter works as an employee of the community drinking water project. His job is to distribute bills of payment as well as other necessary activities for the smooth functioning of the water project. He was offered this opportunity 3 years ago, after he stopped studying. He works from Monday to Saturday and has to move around all parts of the community. 

He also works helping his father to cultivate 7,000 square metres of corn and 7,000 square metres of sesame. He does this in the winter season in the mornings, as in the afternoons he has to finish his work with the water project. The crops are 2 kilometres away from his house.  

The loan funds will be used to buy an ox, as he has to transport the products on his back and he needs a method of transport to move them.

In the future he hopes to buy various animals, as they already have somewhere where they can feed them. He also wants to buy some land where he can build a house, to start his own family.

loans.use: to buy an ox

loans.name: Nancy Isabel

texts.es:
Nancy, a sus 55 años de edad, es madre de tres hijos de 3 hijos y vive en unión libre. 
Debido a la falta de oportunidades laborales ha pasado por una situación económica muy difícil, pues no cuenta con la fuerza suficiente para trabajar como empleada; esto la llevó a buscar opciones para salir adelante y desea montar su propio negocio, un negocio de venta de ropa en su hogar; piensa laborar toda la semana en las tardes y los fines de semana durante todo el día. 

Por esta razón se motiva para solicitar el crédito, que invertirá en la compra de jeans y surtido de ropa al por mayor, de esta manera dará inicio a su idea de negocio, aprovechando la buena ubicación del sector donde pondrá su negocio, pues es una zona muy transitada y existe la posibilidad de atraer muchos clientes potenciales. 

De esta forma, Nancy espera poder recibir los recursos necesarios para salir adelante al lado de su familia y poder ofrecer a sus hijos una mejor educación, además esto servirá como impulso para avanzar hacia el cumplimiento de su principal sueño que es montar un negocio en un local bien acreditado, que le genere buenos ingresos para mejorar a mediano plazo, sus condiciones de vida y la de sus hijos.
texts.en:
Nancy, at her age of 55, is the mother of three children and lives in a common-law marriage.

Due to the lack of work opportunities, a very difficult work situation has occurred. She doesn't have the sufficient strength to work as an employee; this brought her to look for options to get ahead. She wishes to start her own business, a business selling clothing in her home. She's thinking of working all week in the afternoons and during the whole day on weekends.

For this reason, she is motivated to apply for the loan, which she will invest in the purchase of jeans and an assortment of clothing in bulk. In this manner, she will give birth to her business idea, taking advantage of the good location of the sector where she will put her business. It is a very busy area and the possibility to attract many potential clients exists.

In this manner, Nancy hopes to be able to receive the necessary resources to get ahead alongside her family and be able to offer her children a better education. Additionally, this will serve as momentum to advance towards the achievement of her main dream, which is to start a business in a well accredited area. This will generate good income for her to be able to improve she and her children's living conditions in the medium term.

loans.use: to buy jeans and an assortment of clothing in bulk.

loans.name: Jose Edmer

texts.es:
José, de 50 años de edad, estudio hasta sexto grado, está acompañado, su pareja le ayuda con el negocio, en los cultivos y a cuidar su hijo.

José, se dedica a la agricultura; toda su vida se a dedicado a esa actividad, ya que desde muy pequeño lo aprendió de sus padres, viaja todos los días desde hace 3 meses en un pick up, hasta donde tiene su cultivo de yuca.

El crédito sera utilizado para sembrar 14,000 metros cuadrados de yuca, para comercializarla en el mercado y obtener ganancias para salir adelante con su negocio y los gastos de la casa.

Los sueños de  José,  son arreglar bien su  vehículo y hacer crecer su negocio.
texts.en:
José, 50 years old, studied up to the sixth grade and has a partner who helps him with their business, with their crops and taking care of their son. José makes a living from agriculture, having done this all his life as he learned this from his parents from a young age. He has been travelling every day for the past 3 months in a pick-up truck to where he has his cassava field.

The loan will be used to plant 14,000 square metres of cassava, so as to sell it in the market and to obtain income that will get them ahead with their business and home expenses.

The dreams of José are to properly fix his vehicle and to make his business grow.

loans.use: to plant 14,000 square metres of cassava

loans.name: Luis Hernandez

texts.es:
Luis es un campesino, humilde y trabajador con el empuje y verraquera que distingue a los hombres y mujeres del campo.
Es un Hombre de mente emprendedora y desde muy pequeño aprendió todos los oficios del campo como cultivos y crianza de animales, tanto así que hoy en día tiene su propio cultivo de caña de azúcar; productos que vende en la plaza de mercado del municipio de El Carmen De Viboral.
Este personaje tiene como propósito aumentar sus cultivos y mejorar los que actualmente tiene y es por eso que acude a la ayuda de un crédito con la Corporación Interactuar para la compra de insumos agropecuarios como fertilizantes, abonos y la compra de semillas de caña.
El préstamo le dará la oportunidad de progresar como empresario y como persona, además de aumentar sus ingresos y seguir aportando el sustento en su hogar.
Él lo único que quiere es poder mejorar la calidad de vida de él y su familia.
texts.en:
Luis is a farmer. He is humble and hard-working, with the drive and perseverance that distinguishes the men and women that work the field. He is a man with an entrepreneurial mindset. At a young age, he learned how to perform field work, such as cultivating crops and raising animals. Today, he has his own sugarcane crops, and he sells his products in the local market of the town of El Carmen De Viboral.

This man's goal is to increase his crops and improve the ones he currently has. It is for this reason that he is requesting help in the form of a loan from the institution Interactuar to buy agricultural supplies such as fertilizer, compost, and sugarcane seeds. This loan will give him the opportunity to move forward as a businessman and as a person. In addition, it will increase his income, allowing him to continue providing for his family. All he wants is to be able to improve his quality of life and that of his family.

loans.use: to buy agricultural supplies such as fertilizer, compost, and sugarcane seeds.

loans.name: Tomasa

texts.es:
Tomasa, de 50 años de edad, no sabe leer ni escribir, está acompañada, su pareja se dedica a la agricultura y ella por las tardes vende comida típica y pupusas, tiene 2  hijos, los cuales se encuentran estudiando. 

Tomasa, se dedica a la agricultura desde que estaba muy pequeña, lo aprendió de sus padres y ahora, junto a su  esposo y un hijo, caminan 5 kilómetros hasta llegar a lugar donde tienen los cultivos, lo hace todos los días de 7:00 a 11:00 de la mañana y por las tardes se dedica al comercio de la comida típica.  

El crédito sera utilizado para comprar 2 terneras y pago de mano de obra de la recolección de la cosecha, con esto espera tener ganancias suficientes, para salir adelante con su negocio y los gatos de su casa.

Los sueños de  Tomasa, son arreglar su  vivienda, hacer crecer su negocio de platillos típicos y ayudar a sus hijos con los estudio.
texts.en:
Tomasa, 50, does not know how to read or write.  She is common-law-married. Her husband works in agriculture and she sells traditional food and pupusas (corn patties that are usually stuffed with cheese and beans) in the afternoon.  She has two children who are studying in school.

Tomasa has worked in agriculture since she was very young, having learned from her parents.  Now, along with her husband and one of their children, she walks five kilometers to where they have their crops.  She does this every day from 7:00 until 11:00 in the morning; and in the afternoon she sells traditional food.  

The loan will be used to purchase two calves and to pay workers for harvesting the crop.  With this, she hopes to have enough earnings in order to make progress with her business and take care of her household expenses.

Tomasa’s dreams are to fix her house, to grow her business selling traditional dishes, and to help her children with their studies.

loans.use: to purchase two calves, and pay workers for harvesting the crop.

loans.name: Libardo Antonio

texts.es:
Libardo en su búsqueda por un futuro prometedor y unas buenas oportunidades para salir adelante, decidió iniciar un negocio que según él le dará todo eso que siempre ha soñado.

Montara un negocio de tienda de abarrotes en su casa en el municipio de Planeta Rica, con el cual planea sostener a su familia compuesta por sus 4 hijos y su esposa (Ver Foto su esposa y una de sus hijas)

Su principal dificultad es la falta de capital para trabajar.

Para lograr esto necesita la ayuda de un préstamo con la Corporación Interactuar que le permita comprar un enfriador, estanterías, vitrinas y surtido de productos básicos de la canasta familiar como abarrotes, granos, galletas y otros alimentos para abastecer e iniciar su negocio.

Apoya a los sueños emprendedores de un Colombiano con un préstamo hoy!
texts.en:
Libardo, in his search for a promising future and good opportunities to get ahead, decided to start a business that, according to him, will give him all that he has always dreamed of.

He will start a grocery store business in his house in the municipality of Planeta Rica, with which he plans to support his family, made up of his four children and his wife (see photo - his wife and one of his daughters).

His main difficulty is a lack of working capital. To achieve this, he needs the help of a loan with Interactuar Corporation, which will allow him to buy a fryer, shelves, display cases and a stock of basic family products like groceries, grains, cookies and other foods to stock and start his business.

Support the entrepreneurial dreams of a Colombian with a loan today!

loans.use: to buy a fryer, shelves, display cases and a stock of basic family products like groceries, grains, cookies and other foods.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay for her children's school and university fees.

loans.name: Blanca Argelia

texts.es: Blanca de 53 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposo, ella se dedica desde hace 20 años a la agricultura siembra maíz, frijol y pipián, vende sus productos en los alrededores de la zona donde ella reside, con lo que obtiene de sus ventas logra cubrir algunos gastos de su hogar, ella esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de fertilizantes, herbicidas, controles de plagas, abono, semillas, etc. asi como muestra en la fotografía para poder seguir con sus cultivos y tener mejores ingresos.
texts.en: Blanca, 53, lives in her own home with her husband. She has worked for 20 years in agriculture, planting corn, beans and seeds. She sells her products around the area where she lives, using the money from these sales to cover some household expenses. She is asking for a loan to buy fertilizers, herbicides, pest control, seeds, etc. as is shown in the photograph, to continue with her farming and have a higher income.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers, herbicides, pest control, seeds, etc.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to fix a land that he recently bought through a lot of effort.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more clothes at wholesale prices.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy soft drinks, juices, water, milk, and the like.

loans.name: Rosa Elizabeth

texts.es: Rosa vive en casa propia con su esposo, desde hace 15 años se dedica a la crianza de ganado de repasto y venta de leche, comercializa sus productos en los pueblos aledaños, con las ganancias que obtiene de sus ventas logra solventar los gastos que se le presentan en su hogar, ella está solicitando un crédito para la compra de ganado para seguir con la crianza y asi poder tener mejores ingresos.
texts.en: Rosa has lived in her own home with her husband. For 15 years, she has raised cattle and sold milk, selling her products in the surrounding towns. With the earnings from these sales she pays for household costs. She is requesting a loan for the purchase of cattle to continue breeding and so to have a better income.

loans.use: to buy livestock.

loans.name: Vilma Nery

texts.es:
Vilma, estudio hasta noveno grado, está casada y su esposo se dedica a la pesca artesanal, tiene dos hijos, que están estudiando.
 
Vilma, desde pequeña se ha dedicado al comercio informal, ya que su madre se dedicaba a la misma actividad, ella compra y vende pescado.- Cuando se casó, no se le hiso difícil adaptarse al trabajo de su esposo, ya que él se dedica a la extracción de peses en una laguna que está cerca de su casa,

Pero además de esa actividad, ella por las mañanas se dedica a la venta de licuados y otras bebidas, para toda aquella persona que pasa cerca de su casa.

Los fondos del crédito serán utilizados para comprar todos los útiles escolares de su hija mayor, ya que  está estudiando bachillerato y tiene que comprar varios libros y compara todo lo que va a necesitar durante todo el año.

Vilma, desea que su hija estudie y que culmine una carrera universitaria, para que tenga mejores oportunidades que las que ella tuvo.
texts.en:
Vilma studied up to 9th grade. She is married and her husband is a small-scale fisherman. She has two children who are both studying. 

Since she was small Vilma has made a living from informal commerce, as her mother did the same thing. She buys and sells fish. When she got married, it wasn't hard for her to adapt to her husband's job, as he works as a fisherman on a small lake close to their house. 

As well as this, in the mornings she sells smoothies and other drinks to the people who pass by her house.

She will use the loan funds to buy all the school supplies for her eldest daughter, as she is studying in secondary education and she needs to buy various books and everything that she will need for the whole year.

Vilma wants her daughter to study and finish a university career, so that she has better opportunities than she herself did.

loans.use: to buy all the school supplies for her eldest daughter

loans.name: Silvia Marisol

texts.es:
Silvia, de 31 años de edad, estudio hasta primer año de bachillerato, luego no pudo seguir estudiando porque sus padres, ya no podían seguir mandándola a estudiar; está casada y su esposo se dedica a la pesca y es albañil, tiene dos hijos que asisten a  la escuela.

Silvia, se dedica a trabajar como costurera, presta sus servicios especialmente en la temporada de fabricación de uniformes escolares, trabaja todo el día y parte de la noche, ya que le pagan por unidad elaborada, esto lo aprendió de una amiga quien fue la que le enseño esta actividad hace 7 años, cuando termina la temporada de elaboración de uniformes, se dedica a trabajar comprando y vendiendo pescado fresco.

Los fondos del crédito serán utilizados  para comprar lámina, para reparar el techo de su vivienda, ya que está bastante dañado y quiere arreglarlo antes que se acerque la época lluviosa.

El sueño de Silvia, es comprar una maquina cocer eléctrica, para poder rendir más en su trabajo y tener mejores ingresos, para darle a sus hijos el estudio y que tengan una mejor oportunidad de trabajo.
texts.en:
Silvia is 31 years old. She studied through the first year of high school but was unable to continue her studies because her parents could no longer afford to send her to school. She is married, and her husband makes a living fishing and working as a bricklayer. She has two children who are in school.

Silvia makes a living as a seamstress. She offers her services especially in the season when school uniforms are produced. She works all day and part of the night, since she gets paid per unit made. She learned this from a friend who taught her this work 7 years ago. When the season of school uniform production is over, she works buying and selling fresh fish. 

She is requesting a loan to buy metal sheets to repair the roof of her house, which is quite damaged. She wants to fix it before the rainy season approaches. Silvia's dream is to buy a sewing machine so that she can perform her work more efficiently and earn a higher income. This way, she can give her children an education so that they can have better work opportunities.

loans.use: to buy metal sheets to repair the roof of her house.

loans.name: Martha Alicia

texts.es: Alicia es una señora de 29 años de edad, esta casada y tiene 3 hijos de edades de 3,6 y 9 años de edad, Alicia se dedica a la crianza de ganado comenta que tiene una vaca y que con la vaca lechera es como apoya en los gastos de colación, pasajes y algo mas para sus 2 hijos que estudian, el dinero del crédito o va a invertir en la compra de una vaca para tenerla en hierba por la que paga arrienda, el esposo de Alicia se dedica a trabajar de cabecilla o sea que es quien busca trabajo en agricultura para alrededor de 10 personas que están a su cargo, la aspiración de Alicia es de trabajar duro y lograr un capital para construir una casa en un pequeño lote que tiene.
texts.en: Alicia, 29, is married and has 3 children ages 3,6 and 9 years old. Alicia raises livestock and says that having a cow and a dairy cow is how she supports any expenditures and for her 2 children who study. The loan will be invested to buy a cow to have it on the grass which will help pay the rent. Alicia's husband works as a group leader so it's his job to look for work in agriculture for about 10 people who he is in charge of. Alicia aspires to work hard and earn enough money to build a house on a small plot that she has.

loans.use: to buy a cow.

loans.name: Josefina

texts.es: Josefina tiene 42 años de edad y vive con su esposo y su hijo de 10 años de edad al que apoyan para que estudie y pueda tener mejores condiciones de vida. Hace 4 años Josefina decidió instalar un pequeño negocio en su vivienda en el cual elabora y vende deliciosas pupusas que son tan solicitadas por sus clientes además de su sabor por sus precios accesibles. La vivienda de Josefina ha sido construida poco a poco, por lo que se siente feliz de haberlo logrado a base de mucho esfuerzo, pero aún le falta encementar el piso de su vivienda y es para ello que solicita un crédito a FUSAI para invertir en: cemento, arena, grava y piedra para encementar el piso de su vivienda lo antes posible ya que desea aprovechar la época seca para realizar dicha mejora a su vivienda.
texts.en:
Josefina, 42 years old, lives with her husband and 10-year-old son. They are supporting the child so he can study and have better living conditions.

Four years ago, Josefina decided to set up a small business in her home making and selling pupusas, which are in high demand by her clients not only because they taste so good but also the prices are reasonable.

Josefina's home has been built little by little, and she's happy to have accomplished this much through great effort, however the floor still needs to be cemented, and that's why she's requesting a loan from FUSAI. 

She will invest in cement, sand, gravel and stone to cement the floor as soon as possible, since she would like to take advantage of the dry season to complete this improvement to her home.

loans.use: to invest in cement, sand, gravel and stone to cement the floor of her home.

loans.name: José Ovidio

texts.es:
Ovidio, de 66 años de edad, no tuvo la oportunidad de estudiar, está acompañado y su pareja se dedica a los oficios domésticos, sus hijos ya son mayores de edad y tienen sus propias familias.

Ovidio, desde muy joven se a dedicado a la pesca en una laguna que se encuentra cerca de su casa, esta actividad se la enseño su padre, esto lo hace por las tardes hasta el anochecer casi todos los días.-Además, en época de invierno se dedica a trabajar la tierra, cultivando 14,000 metros cuadrados de maíz, esta actividad la realiza a un kilómetro de su casa.

El préstamo será utilizado para comprar cerdos, ya que de esta manera su compañera de vida le ayuda criándolos y posteriormente vendiéndolos, además necesita dinero para rentar la tierra, donde empezara a trabajar sus cultivos agrícolas.

Ovidio, espera a futuro comprarse una lancha, ya que la que tiene se la rentan y esto reduce sus ganancias.
texts.en:
Ovidio, aged 66, did not have the opportunity to go to school. He is in a relationship, and his partner is a homemaker. Their children are of legal age, and they already have their own families.

Since he was very young, Ovidio has been working as a fisherman in a lagoon close to his home. He learned this trade from his father. He goes fishing in the afternoons and works until dusk nearly every day. In addition, during the winter season, he works in farming, growing 14,000 square meters of corn. He follows this occupation in a field located one kilometer from his home.

He will use the loan to buy pigs. His life partner will help him raise them and sell them later. Besides, he needs money to lease the field where he will begin growing his crops.

Ovidio hopes to buy a fishing boat in the future because he is currently renting the one he has, and this expense reduces his earnings.

loans.use: to buy pigs.

loans.name: Romulo Amado

texts.es:
Romulo tiene 34 años de edad es casado tiene 3 hijos y vive con su familia en Guaranda Provincia de Bolivar en la comunidad Bramadero grande. 
El se dedica a la agricultura desde hace algun tiempo a la siembre de mora , maiz, y chochos, tambien tiene animalitos y vende quesos. Solicita el crédito para la compra de insumos agricolas para los sembrios de mora para asi poder obtener una buena pruducciòn realiza las compras en Guranda cada semana, su sueño es que sus hijos terminen sus estudios para que sean profesionales, los desafios a los que se enfrenta es las enfermedades.
En su tiempo libre le gusta jugar boli.
texts.en:
Romulo, 34, is married and has three children. He lives with his family in Guaranda, Province of Bolivar, in the community of Bramadero Grande.

He has worked in agriculture for some time, planting blackberries, corn, and chocho beans. He also has animals and sells cheese. He is applying for a loan to buy farm supplies for his blackberry crops so that he can have good production. He buys products in Guranda every week. 

His dream is for his children to finish their studies so they can be professionals. A challenge he faces is diseases. In his free time, he likes to play volleyball.

loans.use: to maintain his blackberry crops.

loans.name: Marta

texts.es: Marta es una mujer de 50 años de edad que desde muy joven aprendió a ganarse la vida demostrando ser una mujer laboriosa y emprendedora, por lo que actualmente se dedica a la crianza y posterior venta de pollos la cual realiza en el mercado municipal, pero además en su vivienda también solicitan sus productos, gracias a este pequeño negocio logra mantener la economía de su familia desde hace 4 años. Ella vive con sus 2 nietos una niña de 6 años y un varón de 9 años de edad con los que habita en vivienda propia desde hace muchos años, ella es la responsable de ellos luego de la pérdida de su hijo. Marta siempre está buscando la manera de seguir mejorando la calidad de vida de su familia, por lo que solicita un crédito a FUSAI para invertir en: pollos, concentrado y cerdos, ya que desea dedicarse a la crianza de cerdos también por lo que espera contar con este crédito lo antes posible para seguir sosteniendo y mejorando la calidad de vida de su familia.
texts.en:
Marta is a 50-year-old woman who learned to earn a living at a very young age. She has demonstrated that she is a hardworking, enterprising woman. She currently raises and sells chickens in the town market, but she also has demand for her products at home. Thanks to this small business, she has managed to maintain her family economy for 4 years.

She lives with her two grandchildren, a 6-year-old girl and a 9-year-old boy. She has lived with them in her own home for many years. She has been responsible for them since the loss of her son. 

Marta is always looking for a way to continue improving her family's quality of life, which is why she is applying for a loan from FUSAI to invest in chickens, feed, and pigs. She would like to raise pigs as well, which is why she hopes to count on this loan as soon as possible to continue maintaining and improving her family's quality of life.

loans.use: to invest in chicken, feed, and pigs.

loans.name: Arles Edith

texts.es:
Arles es una joven carismática, responsable y casera que desea iniciar su vida como independiente, a sus 25 años de edad ha desempeñado trabajo de vendedora y promotora, pero son trabajos muy esporádicos y no fijos.
La idea de Arles es trabajar junto con su madre en la venta de calzado y ropa ambulante, es decir ir puerta a puerta, donde vecinos, familiares, para vender estos productos y entre ambas sostener la casa.
Arles solicita de una manera formal un crédito para la compra de indumentaria para hombre y mujer y calzado, este apoyo permitirá que estas dos mujeres consoliden un negocio familiar y mejoren su calidad de vida
texts.en:
Arles is a charismatic, responsible, and home-loving woman who would like to start her independent life. At 25, she has worked as a saleswoman and promoter, but her jobs are very sporadic and not fixed.

Arles's idea is to work with her mother selling footwear and clothing as a traveling saleswoman, going door to door to sell these products to neighbors and acquaintances to sustain the household between the two of them.

Arles is applying formally for a loan to buy clothing for men and women as well as footwear. This support will allow these two women to consolidate a family business and improve their quality of life.

loans.use: to start her business selling footwear and clothing for women and men by buying merchandise.

loans.name: El Encanto Group

texts.es:
El Encanto es el nombre que eligieron los integrantes del grupo que desempeñan una actividad que les agrada y que además les representa una oportunidad para brindar a su familia una mejor calidad de vida; ellos son:

Feliza - Lavandería
Juan Carlos - Comida 
José Luis - Tortillería
Karla - Masoterapia
Jorge - Soldador
Jesús – Perfumes

Don Juan Carlos es una persona muy seria pero muy amable también. El perder su empleo y la gran necesidad de ofrecer a su familia una buena calidad de vida lo motivó a iniciar con un puesto de venta de hamburguesas y hot dog desde hace ya 4  años. Desde entonces vende todos los días por las tardes en la cochera de su casa la cual adecuó de tal manera que ha logrado acomodar las mesas, las dos barras, el lavabo, la parrilla, el refrigerador, los nachos, el horno de micro ondas y un estéreo para que los clientes disfruten su comida mientras escuchan buena música. Además, Don Juan cuenta con el apoyo de sus esposa e hijas mientras elabora la comida. Después de preparar todo, a las 7 pm se abre el portón de la cochera como señal de que los clientes pueden comenzar a deleitarse. Finalmente, el portón se cierra hasta que el último cliente se ha ido. "He definido mi propio estilo y las hamburguesas que preparo simulan una cara feliz".

Juan Carlos cuenta que los préstamos le en sido de mucha utilidad pues los ha empleado para comprar todos los ingredientes que necesita en grandes cantidades para mantener su negocio andando de la mejor manera. Con sus ganancias ha podido brindar a su familia mejores condiciones de vida y ha hecho algunas remodelaciones al ngocio. El nuevo préstamo que solicita planea invertirlo en la compra de pan, tortillas de harina, jamón, queso, aceite, papas, verdura, nachos, aceite, refrescos, chiles, salsa y gas pues con la reciente inauguración de la tienda departamental frente a su casa le ha permitido incrementar más sus ventas.

*La footografía fue tomada en el negocio de don Juan Carlos quien viste playera a rayas al lado de su hija Karla.
texts.en:
El Encanto [The Charm] is the name chosen by this group’s members.  They are engaged in occupations that they enjoy, and that also provide them with the opportunity to give their families a better quality of life.  

They are Feliza, who has a laundry; Juan Carlos, who sells food; José Luis, who has a tortilla shop; Karla, a massage therapist; Jorge, a welder; and Jesús, who sells perfume.

Juan Carlos is a very serious person, but he is also very friendly.  The loss of his job, and the great necessity to give his family a good quality of life motivated him to open a hamburger and hot dog restaurant four years ago.  Since then, he has been making sales every afternoon in his garage, which he has adapted in such a way that he has been able to accommodate tables, two counters, a washroom, a grill, a refrigerator, nachos, a microwave, and a stereo, so that the customers may enjoy their food while listening to good music.


Juan also has the support of his wife and daughters while making the food.  After preparing everything, he opens the door to the garage door at 7 P.M., which is a signal to his customers that they can start enjoying themselves.  Finally, the door is not closed until the last customer has gone. Juan Carlos says, “I have defined my own style, and I make hamburgers that look like happy faces”.

Juan Carlos says that the loans have been very useful for him, as he has used them to purchase all the ingredients that he needs in great quantities to maintain his business at its best.  With his earnings, he has been able to provide his family with better living conditions, and he has made some renovations in the business.

He plans to invest the new loan that he is requesting in the purchase of bread, tortillas, ham, cheese, oil, potatoes, vegetables, nachos, soft drinks, peppers, salsa, and gas, as the recent opening of a department store across the street from his house has allowed him to increase his sales more.


The photograph was taken in Juan Carlos’ business.  He is wearing a striped shirt, and he is standing next to his daughter Karla.

loans.use: to purchase bread, flour tortillas, ham, cheese, oil, potatoes, vegetables, nachos, soft drinks, peppers, salsa, and gas.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase cement, sand, gravel, bricks, and rebar to build a bedroom in his house.

loans.name: Cfjdt 1 Group

texts.fr: CFJDT 5 est un sous groupe de la Convention des Femmes et Jeunes pour le Développement de Tassette. Ils habitent tous dans le même village et pratiquent les mêmes activités. Ils se regroupent tous les fins de mois pour faire des cotisations. Leur présidente s'appelle Pauline, elle est mariée et mère de famille. Elle évolue dans l'agriculture des céréales comme le mil, le niébé, l'arachide et la commercialisation des fruits et légumes. Elle sollicite ce crédit pour acheter des semences et acheter des légumes pour les vendre ensuite. Elle a une expérience de plus de 10 ans et commence sa journée à 9h pour la terminer à 20h. Elle aide son mari dans la gestion des charges familiales et les frais de scolarités de ses enfants. Elle voudrais à l'avenir voir deux boutiques de denrées alimentaires. Ainsi elle pourra augmenter ses revenus et diversifier ses produits.
texts.en: The CFJDT 5 group is a subgroup of the Association of Women and Young People for the Development of Tassette. The group members all live in the same village and have the same line of work. They meet at the end of each month to make their payments. Their chair is Pauline, who is married and has children. She is a farmer growing cereals, such as millet, "niébé" [ a type of black-eyed beans] and peanuts, as well as selling fruits and vegetables. She is requesting this loan in order to buy seeds and also to buy vegetables for resale. She has over 10 years of experience and starts her work day at 9 AM and finishes at 8 PM. She helps her husband meet everyday family expenses and the school fees for their children. In the future, she would like to have two grocery stories. In this way she would be able to increase her revenues and diversify her products.

loans.use: to buy seeds and agricultural inputs for farming.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: purchase chairs and rocking chairs at wholesale to sell.

loans.name: Oriana Yosiris

texts.es:
Oriana toda la vida ha sido muy independiente, desde pequeña mostro fanatismo por el emprendimiento buscando el sustento vendiendo dulces, accesorios para tener un ingreso con lo cual a su época gastaba en dulces.
Es casada y tiene una pequeña de 11 años y como toda madre quiere darle lo mejor, una herencia, una buena educación que nunca le falte nada, su vida se ha tornado un poco difícil debido a una incapacidad que por no querer generar lastima prefiere no nombrarla pero a pesar de ello va todos los días a tender su negocio de venta de productos de uso personal.
Solicita un crédito para la compra de desodorantes, talcos, paños para bebes, accesorios para mujeres, maquillaje etc.
texts.en:
Oriana has been independent all her life. Since she was young she has shown enthusiasm for enterprise looking for her sustenance selling sweets. She is married and has an 11 year old daughter. Like every mother she wants to provide her with the best, an inheritance, the good education that she never had.

Her life has become a bit more difficult due to a disability. But she doesn't want to evoke pity so she rather not name it. In spite of this she takes care of her business selling personal use items every day. She is requesting a loan to buy deodorants, talcum, diapers, accessories for women, make-up, etc.

loans.use: to buy deodorant, talcum, diapers for babies, accessories for women and make-up to continue to improve her business day by day.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy fertilizer, manure, pesticide and carrots seed to assist her vegetable crops.

loans.name: Salvador

texts.en: Salvador is a farmer and he lives with his parents. Salvador is married and he has a one-year-old son. Salvador makes cheese. He needs another loan to buy more cattle to make more cheese and to sell more cheese. Salvador is the only one at his home who works, so he needs your help to support his family.

loans.use: to buy more cattle

loans.name: Patricia Isabel

texts.es:
Con mucho empuje y perseverancia, Patricia desea iniciar un negocio de cría y levante de ganado en su finca ubicada en el municipio de Planeta Rica.

Esta idea surge a partir de la necesidad de generar unos buenos ingresos para colaborar con el sostenimiento del hogar en que vive con sus hijos.

Se caracteriza por ser una mujer alegre y muy colaboradora, cualidades que han hecho que se gane el cariño y respeto de la gente de la vereda.
Con este préstamo podrá dar inicio a este negocio.

El dinero será invertido en la compra de 3 terneros para irlos adelantado y creciendo.

Apoya a Patricia a salir adelante con un préstamo hoy!
texts.en:
Having great drive and perseverance, Patricia wants to start a livestock-raising business on her farm, which is located within the municipality of Planeta Rica.

This idea arises from the need to generate good earnings in order to help provide for her home in which she lives with her children. 
She is characterized by being a cheerful and very helpful woman—qualities that have won her the affection and respect of all the people in the neighborhood.

With this loan, she will start this business, investing the money in the purchase of three calves to raise.  Help Patricia to get ahead, with a loan today.

loans.use: to purchase three calves to raise.

loans.name: Jorge Alexander

texts.es: Jorge tiene 34 años de edad y habita en casa propia junto a su compañera de vida y su hija de 4 años de edad.  Jorge es un hombre dedicado a su familia y hace todo lo que este en sus manos para llevar el sustento diario. Con el deseo de mejorar sus condiciones habitacionales ha tomado la decisión de solicitar este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de cemento, arena, ladrillo, hierro, etc. para invertir en la construcción de un servicio sanitario y así poder contar con condiciones más higiénicas para su familia.
texts.en:
Jorge is 34 years old and lives in his own home with his partner and four-year-old daughter. Jorge is devoted family man and makes every effort to improve their livelihood. 

Wanting to improve their living conditions, he made the decision to apply for a loan from FUSAI to invest in the purchase of cement, sand, brick, iron, etc. to build a sewer system – and therefore be able to have more hygienic conditions for his family.

loans.use: to buy cement, sand, brick, iron, etc. to build a sewer system.

loans.name: Paula Emilia

texts.es: Paula de 46 años de edad vive en casa propia con sus esposo y sus cuatro hijos, ella se dedica desde hace 14 años a la agricultura siembra maíz y frijol, y comercializa sus productos en los diferentes mercados que se encuentra cerca de su casa ya tiene clientes establecidos, ella esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de semillas, fertilizantes, abonos, controles de plagas, herbicidas y mejorar el terreno que muestra la fotografía y asi poder seguir con sus cultivos ya que esa es la unica fuente de trabajo.
texts.en:
Paula, 46, lives in her own house with her husband and their four children. She has been working in agriculture for 14 years, planting corn and beans.  She sells her products in different markets that are near her house, and she now has established customers. 

She is requesting a loan for the purchase of seed, fertilizer, compost, and pest control; and to improve the land that is shown in the photograph.  In this way, she will be able to continue with her farming, as that is her only source of work.

loans.use: to purchase seed, fertilizer, compost, and pest control; and to improve the land.

loans.name: Glosman Elena

texts.es:
Glosman es una mujer de 42 años de edad del campo, libre, un tanto despreocupada, que goza la vida, su negocio de cría de cerdos representa el sustento para una extensa familia conformada por 8 hijos, en verdad una familia difícil de mantener.
Por obvias razones muy marcadas por la necesidad necesita mejorar sus ingresos pues quiere tener una vida más digna y mejores oportunidades para su familia, es por eso que quiere recurrir a un crédito para invertir en la compra de cerdos, cuido para alimentarlos y algunas adecuaciones a su cochera. 
Tu ayuda sería un gran impulso para esta mujer que busca sacar a cada uno de sus hijos de la pobreza, motivarlos a estudiar y que juntes saquen esta gran familia adelante.
texts.en:
Glosman is a 42-year-old woman from the countryside. She is free and rather happy-go-lucky, and she enjoys life. Her business of raising pigs represents sustenance for an extensive family, which is made up of her 8 children. In truth, it's difficult to maintain such a family.

For obvious and very noticeable reasons, Glosman needs to earn more income as she wants to have a more decent life and better opportunities for her family. For this reason, she is turning to a loan to purchase pigs, to pay for care and nourishment for them, and to make some adaptations to her sheds. 

Your help would be a great boost for this woman who is seeking to lift each one of her children out of poverty and motivate them to study, and together forge ahead as a family.

loans.use: to buy pigs and animal feed to be able to provide for her 8 children.

loans.name: Jose Mauricio

texts.es: Jose de 57 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposa y sus tres hijos, el se dedica desde hace 40 años al cultivo de maíz, y a la crianza de ganado y cerdos, gracias a los años de experiencia que tiene ha podido tener muy buenas cosechas, Jose esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de comida para cerdos, fertilizantes, abonos, controles de plagas, semillas asi como muestra en la fotografía para seguir con su trabajo y tener mejores ingresos.
texts.en: Jose is 57 years old and lives in his own house with his wife and 3 children. He has worked the last 40 years growing corn and raising cattle and pigs. Thanks to his years of experience he has been able to obtain very good harvests.

loans.use: to buy pig feed, fertilizer, manure, pest control and seeds.

loans.name: Norma  Jeaqueline

texts.es: Norma de 31 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposo y su hijo, ella se dedica desde hace 10 años a la agricultura al cultivo de maíz y frijol, cuando ya está su cosecha la comercializa en los pueblos aledaños, ya tiene muchos clientes fijos, ella está solicitando un crédito para la compra de semillas, fertilizantes, abonos, controles de plagas, herbicidas, etc. y mejorar el terreno que muestra en la fotografía para poder continuar con sus cultivos ya que esa es su única fuente de trabajo y así tener mejores ingresos.
texts.en:
Norma, 31, lives in her own house with her husband and child.  She has been working in agriculture for 10 years, growing corn and beans.  When her harvest is ready, she sells it in the surrounding villages, and she now has many regular customers. 

She is requesting a loan for the purchase of seed, fertilizer, compost pest control, herbicides, and such; and for improving the land that is shown in the photograph.  Thus, she can continue farming, as that is her only source of work; and in this way, she will have better earnings.

loans.use: to purchase seed, fertilizer, compost, pest control, herbicides and such; and to improve the land.

loans.name: Saul

texts.es:
Saul tiene 42 años de edad, vive con su cónyuge y sus dos hijos en el distrito de Pucará, que se encuentra ubicado en la provincia de Jaén, región Cajamarca, en la sierra norte de Perú. La población de este distrito se dedica a la agricultura, ganadería y comercio como actividades económicas principales.

El se dedica a brindar servicio de transporte público, cuenta con un vehículo propio (mototaxi) con el cual brinda este servicio, cuenta con 10 años de experiencia en el rubro y con muy buenas referencias personales y laborales en la zona. Adicionalmente se dedica a la crianza de animales de corral como son gallinas, patos, pavos, etc. El préstamo será para realizar reparaciones y mantenimiento de su vehículo ya que actualmente se encuentra en mal estado, esto le permitirá brindar un mejor servicio a sus clientes lo que le generará mayores ingresos y mejorará su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Saul is 42 years old. He lives with his wife and their two children in the District of Pucará, which is in in Jaén Province. This community is situated in the region of Cajamarca in the northern mountains of Peru. The people who live in this district engage in agriculture, livestock breeding, and trade as their main business activities.

Saul provides public transportation services. He has his own vehicle (a motorcycle taxi) that he uses to provide this service. Saul has 10 years of experience in this trade and also has very good personal and work-related references who are from the area. In addition, he raises farm animals such as chickens, ducks, turkeys, and other livestock.

His loan will be used for repairs and maintenance of his vehicle since it is currently in bad condition. This will allow him to provide better service to his customers so that he can generate more income and improve his quality of life and that of his family.

loans.use: to pay for repairs and maintenance of his vehicle.

loans.name: Julia

texts.es: Julia de 42 años de edad se dedica desde hace 10 años al cultivo de maíz, comercializa sus productos en los diferentes mercados que se encuentran cerca de su casa, vive con su esposo en casa propia, Julia está solicitando un crédito para la compra de semillas, fertilizantes, abonos, controles de plagas, etc. para poder continuar con su trabajo y tener mejores ingresos.
texts.en:
Julia, who is 42 years old, has made a living for 10 years growing corn and selling her products in various markets close to her home. She lives with her husband in their own home. 

Julia is requesting a loan in order to buy seeds, fertilizer and pest control in order to continue her work and earn a better income.

loans.use: to buy seeds, fertilizer, pest controls, etc.

loans.name: Miguel Angel

texts.es:
Miguel, logro estudiar hasta octavo grado, está acompañado, compañera de vida se dedica a los oficios domésticos, vive con dos de sus hijos menores, los cuales están estudiando. 

Miguel, ha trabajado como albañil desde muy joven, ya que su padre se dedicaba a esta misma actividad, trabaja dependiendo el lugar donde lo contratan, en ocasiones tiene que trabajar en lugares bastante retirados de su casa, tiene que empezar a trabajar muy temprano y sale de 3:00 a 4:00 de la tarde, en ocasiones también, se dedica a la pesca artesanal en una laguna que esta cerca de su casa, esto lo hace cuando no tiene trabajo como albañil.

Los fondos del crédito serán utilizados para construir un cuarto para su hija, ya que quiere apoyarla porque hace poco dio a luz y no tiene donde vivir. 


Miguel, quiere ayudar a su hija ahora que lo necesita.
texts.en:
Miguel manged to study up to Grade 8. He is in a relationship, his life partner does domestic work. He lives with his two youngest daughters who are studying. Miguel has worked as a bricklayer since he was very young. His father worked in thus same trade.

His work depends upon where he is contracted. Sometimes he has to work in places that are quite far from his house. So he has to start to work very early and finish at 3 to 4 in the evening. Sometimes too he works in small scale fishing in a lagoon that is close to his house. This is what he does when he doesn't have work as a bricklayer.

The money from the loan will be used to build a room for his daughter as he wants to support her as she gave birth to a child recently and has no place to live. Miguel wants to help his daughter now when she needs it.

loans.use: to build a room for his daughter.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: La joven a quien se le ha pixeleado la cara por tener 27 años de edad y vivir en zona de alto riesgo, es muy trabajadora y responsable, quien se dedica a la venta de frutas y verduras desde hace 6 años, ubicado en el mercado municipal  que está cerca de su lugar de residencia, la joven es madre soltera vive en casa propia con sus tres hijos y esta solicitando un préstamo para poder comprar más frutas y verduras por mayor, para tener mejores ingresos y una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: The young lady whose face has been pixelled for being 27 years old and for living in a high risk zone, is very hard working and responsible. She has worked selling fruits and vegetables for the past 6 years. Her stand is located at the municipal market close to her house. She is a single mother who lives in her own home with her three children. She is asking for a loan to buy more fruits and vegetables wholesale, to have better earnings and a better quality of life.

loans.use: To buy more fruits and vegatables wholesale

loans.name: Juan Carlos

texts.es: Carlos es un joven de 22 años de edad, que por motivo de recursos económicos solamente  termino la primaria y se dedica a trabajar al jornal,  vive con sus padres y sus hermanos que asisten a la escuela y una sobrina de 3 años, Carlos se dedica al jornal de trabajos de agricultura, su madre es quien le enseña cómo se cría animales menores, Carlos va a invertir el dinero del crédito en la compra de chanchos , lo que el aspira es trabajar para mejorar su negocio y apoyar en los gastos de su hogar, ya que sus padres no les alcanza por motivo de que tiene gastos de arriendo, gastos de educación, alimentación y mas.
texts.en:
Carlos is a young man who is 22 years of age. Due to financial reasons, he was only able to finish school through the primary level. Carlos works as a day laborer. He lives with his parents and his siblings who are in school. His three-year-old niece also lives with them.

Carlos works in agriculture as a day laborer. His mother taught him how to raise small animals. Carlos will invest the money from his loan in the purchase of pigs. His aspiration is to work toward improving his business so that he can help with the household expenses. His parents are not able to pay for everything since they must cover expenses such as rent, education, food, and other items.

loans.use: to buy pigs.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to have working capital to invest in fruits and vegetables.

loans.name: Gustavo Enrique

texts.es:
Gustavo es un trabajador de calle, padre de dos hijos, responsable amoroso, servicial y sobretodo muy trabajador pues a cada día de trabajo le dedica entre 10 y 12 horas debido a que este hombre es vendedor de pescado y su ruta de venta es realmente extensa y agotante dado que toda la mercancía la carga en sus hombros.
La venta de  pescado como tilapia y bocachico son sus fuertes y productos muy pedidos pro restaurante y gente común de la zona, y su idea es que con la ayuda de un crédito comprar en grandes cantidades para cubrir más tiendas, que para el significara mejores ingresos. 
Por eso pide de manera formal y pero esperanzado en que lo apoyen para comprar surtido de tilapia y bocachico.
texts.en:
Gustavo is a street vendor, a responsible and loving father of two children, helpful, and above all, hardworking.  He devotes 10 to 12 hours to each working day because he is a fish seller, and his sales route is very extensive. It is also exhausting, given that he carries all the merchandise on his shoulders.

His sales of fish such as Tilapia and Bocachico (“small mouth”, a fresh water fish) are strong, and his products are very much requested by restaurants and most of the people in the area.  

His idea is to purchase greater quantities with the help of a loan, in order to cover more stores, which will mean better earnings for him.
For this he is formally but hopefully requesting support in order to purchase a supply of Tilapia and Bocachico.

loans.use: to purchase fish (Tilapia and Bocachico).

loans.name: Cuna De Moises Ahorros (Flat) Group

texts.es:
Los integrantes del grupo Cuna de Moisés son personas muy alegres y muy trabajadoras, los une el lazo familiar y mantienen una buena relación apoyándose en todo momento.
 
Doña Eva es la representante del grupo, es una mujer muy alegre, le encanta platicar mucho con las personas, tiene 49 años de edad y está casada con el señor David quien se dedica al campo. La pareja tiene una familia de once hijos de los cuales cuatro de ellos aún están estudiando.

Anteriormente Don David vendía limones y aguacates en una pequeña plaza, sus ventas eran muy buenas, desafortunadamente el precio del aguacate y limón comenzaron a aumentar y esto lo llevó a la quiebra. Entonces, la pareja decidió utilizar sus ahorros para comprar algunos productos de abarrotes. Aunque iniciaron con muy poca mercancía, la ilusión de Doña Eva era hacerla crecer.

En cuanto escuchó hablar de VisionFund, Doña Eva decidió solicitar crédito para invertir en su tiendita de abarrotes. Ya son 8 años los que lleva solicitando crédito y está muy contenta y agradecida porque gracias a todas esas pequeñas inversiones ella ha podido hacer crecer su negocio y sacar adelante a sus hijos, todos han estudiado y los que aún dependen de ella asisten a la primaria, secundaria, preparatoria y uno más, a la universidad. Aunque los gastos de Doña Eva son grandes, su mayor ilusión es que todos sus hijos estudien una carrera profesional para que puedan tener una mejor calidad de vida. Con este nuevo préstamo comprará más productos de abarrotes, específicamente lácteos que es lo que más le hace falta.

Los demás integrantes del grupo también están muy contentos y agradecidos con su préstamo porque podrán invertir en sus negocios, Noé comprará herramienta para desempeñar su trabajo como albañil y María Isabel, en materia prima para la carpintería que maneja con su esposo. 

*La fotografía fue tomada en la tienda de Doña Eva.
texts.en:
The members of the "Cuna de Moisés" are very happy and hard-working. They are related by family and keep good relations helping each other at all times.

Eva is the representative of the group. She is a very happy person who loves to talk a lot with people. She is 49 years old and is married to David who is a farmer. The couple has a family of 11 children, 4 of whom are still studying. David used to sell lemons and avocados in a small plaza. his sales were good but unfortunately prices of avocados and lemons start to climb and it broke him.

Then the couple decide to use their savings to buy some grocery products. Although they started with little merchandise Eva's vision was to make it grow. When she heard talk of VisionFund Eva decided to request a loan to invest in her small grocery store.

It is 8 years now that she has been requesting loans and she is very happy and grateful because thanks to all these small investments she has been able to expand her business and raise her children. They have all studied and those that still depend on her attend primary, middle and secondary school and one is going to university. Although Eva's expenses are high her greatest dream is for all her children study to be professionals so that they can have a better quality of living. With this new loan she will buy more grocery products, especially dairy products which is what she is short of.

The other members of the group are also happy and grateful for the loan as they can invest in their businesses. Noé will buy tools to do his work as a bricklayer and María Isabel will buy raw materials for the carpentry shop she runs with her husband. The photograph was taken in Eva's store.

loans.use: to buy dairy products.

loans.name: Elizabeth

texts.es:
Elizabeth es una joven muy creativa y emprendedora de 21 años de edad que con los ánimos y ganas de estudiar creo su negocio de venta de helados, este negocio le ha dado mucha felicidad pues estudiar es su mayor hobby.
Solicita un apoyo para la compra de una nevera en donde almacenar sus productos ya que utiliza la de su casa y como tiene tantas cremas que ya no hay espacio para los alimentos. 
Este crédito ayudara a crecer más a Elizabeth como empresa y seguir en pie su sueño de terminar su estudios universitarios
texts.en: Elizabeth is a very creative and enterprising 21 year old youth. With the desire to study she created her business of selling ice cream. This business has provided her with much happiness as studying is her favorite hobby. She is requesting a loan to buy a freezer to store her products. She now uses the one in her house but as she has so many ice creams there is no room for food. This loan will help Elizabeth to grow more as a business and continue on the route of her dream of completing her university studies.

loans.use: to buy a freezer to refrigerate her ice-cream as using the one in the house takes up too much space.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy perfumes, lotions, creams, shampoo, deodorant, etc. on wholesale.

loans.name: Noe

texts.es:
Noé, de 74 años de edad, no tuvo la oportunidad de estudiar debido a la condición económica de sus padres, está casado y su esposa se dedica a los oficios domésticos, sus hijos ya son mayores de edad y han formado sus propias familias.

Noé, desde muy pequeño se dedicó a la pesca artesanal en la laguna que se encuentra cerca de su casa, su padre fue quien le enseño.- Noe, pesca por las tardes y en la noche, además en época de invierno se dedica a cultivar 14,000 metros cuadrados de maíz, el lugar donde tiene sus cultivos está a un kilómetro de su casa.

Los fondos del crédito serán destinados para comprar dos novillas, ya que actualmente tiene rastrojos donde puedan pastar, además, necesita pagar el arrendamiento de la tierra, donde cultivara este nuevo año, porque tiene que pagarlo por anticipado.

Noé, desea poder darle mejores comodidades a su esposa.
texts.en:
74-year old Noé didn’t have the opportunity to go to school because of his parents’  financial situation. He is married and his wife looks after the home. His children are already grown up and have their own families.

Since he was a young boy Noé has earned his living catching fish in the lagoon near his home, a skill he learned from his father. He fishes in the afternoons and evenings, and then during the winter he plants maize on his 14,000 m2 farm which is located a kilometer from his house.

Noé plans to use the loan money to buy two heifers as he already has fields of stubble from the maize where the animals can feed. He also has to pay the rent in advance on the land he farms.

He wishes to provide his wife with a more comfortable life.

loans.use: buy two heifers

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: La joven a quien se le ha pixeleado la cara por tener 23 años de edad y vivir en zona de alto riesgo, se dedica desde hace varios años a la venta de miel de abeja, comercializa sus productos en los diferentes mercados que están cerca de su casa, tiene muchos clientes por la calidad del producto, la joven vive en casa propia con su compañero de vida y sus dos hijos, ella esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de mas miel por mayor y así poder seguir con sus ventas para tener mejores ingresos.
texts.en:
The young woman whose face has been pixelated in the photo is 23 years old and lives in a high-risk area. She has earned her living for several years selling honey in the different markets located near her house. Because she sells a high-quality product, she has many customers.

She lives in her own house with her husband and two children. She is seeking a loan to buy more honey in bulk so she can continue with her business and improve her income.

loans.use: buy more honey in bulk

loans.name: Carlos De Jesus

texts.es: Carlos de 46 años de edad desde muy joven aprendió a trabajar la tierra, por lo que se dedica a cultivar maíz y frijol desde hace 15 años, con su trabajo es como logra dar mejores condiciones de vida a su familia, el  vive en casa propia con su esposa, Carlos desea invertir en insumos para su cultivo ya que dentro de poco empieza la época de siembra, para ello solicita un crédito para invertir en: fertilizantes, controles de plagas, herbicidas, semillas, abono y mejorar el terreno que muestra en la fotografía para seguir con su cultivo con el que espera seguir mejorando las condiciones de vida de su familia.
texts.en:
As a young boy, 46-year old Carlos learned how to work the land. He has grown maize and beans for fifteen years. This is how he manages to improve his family's living conditions. Carlos lives in his own house with his wife.

He now wishes to buy supplies for his farm as the sowing season will soon be starting. He is seeking a loan to buy fertilizer, insecticide, herbicide, seeds, and compost so he can improve the land that can be seen in the photograph. Then he can continue working his land and improving his family’s standard of living.

loans.use: buy fertilizer, insecticide, herbicide, seeds, and compost

loans.name: Alvaro Alexander

texts.es: Álvaro de 33 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposa, el posee una pequeña tienda ubicada en su lugar de residencia desde hace varios años, con lo que realiza de sus ventas logra salir adelante, el quiere mejorar su vivienda colocando las puertas y balcones en la ventanas, pero no tiene de suficiente capital, por eso solicita un crédito para la compra de puertas, balcones y pago de mano de obra para que el y su esposa puedan vivir más seguros y cómodos.
texts.en: Álvaro, 33, owns the home where he lives with his wife. For several years he has had a small store in his home, and the sales from this help him to get ahead. He wants to make improvements to his home, installing doors and putting bars on the windows, but he doesn't have enough capital. He asks for a loan to buy doors, bars and pay for labor so that he and his wife can live more securely and comfortably.

loans.use: to  buy doors and window bars, and to pay for labor.

loans.name: Francisco Yaroc

texts.es:
El Sr. Francisco Yaroc labora como profesor en una escuela publica, donde imparte clases a niños de 6-12 años desde hace 4 años con horarios de lunes a viernes de 7 am finalizando su jornada laboral a las 1 pm.
El Sr. Francisco Yaroc es un joven maestro que esta solicitando el apoyo de kiva atravez de un prestamo para la compra de una motocicleta puesto que diariamente tiene que recorrer 16 km desde su lugar de origen hasta su centro de trabajo y actualmente su medio de transporte es una bicicleta lo cual le resulta muy agotador afectandolo en su rendimiento laboral.
texts.en:
Francisco Yaroc works as a teacher in a public school, where he gives classes to kids between the ages of 6 and 12. He has done this for 4 years and works Monday through Friday, starting at 7 A.M. and finishing his workday at 1 P.M. 

Francisco Yaroc is a young teacher who is requesting Kiva’s support through a loan to buy a motorcycle. Every day, he has to go 16 kilometers from his place of origin to his workplace, and currently his mode of transportation is a bicycle. Riding the bike to work is very exhausting and affects his performance at work.

loans.use: to buy a motorcycle.

loans.name: Jose Nery

texts.es: Jose de 38 años de edad se dedica desde hace 15 años al cultivo de maíz, comercializa sus productos en los diferentes mercados que se encuentran cerca de su casa, vive con sus dos hijas en casa propia, Jose está solicitando un crédito para la compra de semillas, fertilizantes, abonos, controles de plagas, etc. para poder continuar con su trabajo y tener mejores ingresos.
texts.en:
Jose, 38, has been cultivating corn for 15 years.  He sells his products in the various markets near his home.  He lives with his two daughters in his own home.  

Jose is requesting a loan to buy seeds, chemical and organic fertilizers, pesticides, and other agricultural supplies so that he can continue with his work and generate more income.

loans.use: to buy agricultural supplies

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: La joven a quien se le ha pixeleado la cara por tener 22 años de edad y vivir en zona de alto riesgo, se dedica desde hace varios años al cultivo de maíz, comercializa sus productos en los alrededores de la zona donde ella reside, la joven vive en casa propia con su madre y sus seis hermanos ellos también le ayudan en las siembra, ella está solicitando un crédito para la compra de de semillas, fertilizantes, abonos, controles de plagas, etc. y mejorar el terreno que muestra en la fotografía para poder continuar con su trabajo y tener mejores ingresos.
texts.en: This young borrower, whose face is blurred, is 22 years old.  She lives in a high risk area.  For a number of years, she has been cultivating corn.  She sells her products in the outskirts of the area where she lives.  This youth lives in her own home with her mother and her six siblings.  They also help out with the farm.  She is requesting a loan to buy seeds, chemical and organic fertilizers, pesticides, and other supplies, and also to improve the land that is shown in the photograph.  This way, she can continue with her work and obtain more income.

loans.use: to buy agricultural supplies and to improve her land

loans.name: Elvia Maria

texts.es:
María trabaja en un almacén enfocado en la ropa bebe, accesorios y en pocas palabras todo lo relacionado con ellos.
Inicio su negocio como una necesidad económica, explorando este mundo emprendedor y poco a poco fue convirtiendo sus ventas en un almacén que es el que se puede ver en la foto.
Como está iniciando año se trazó unos propósitos en los cuales trabajar los cuales son mejorar sus ventas, aumentar sus clientes, incrementar su utilidad, formalizar su negocio, mejorar su punto de venta y en dos años tener un nuevo local, una apuesta muy ambiciosa pero que si no se proyecta no se pelea por ella.
Con la ayuda de un crédito quiere comprar surtido de ropa para bebe e iniciar un camino de mucho trabajo para el cumplimento de sus deberes.
texts.en:
María works in a store that sells infant clothes, accessories, and in short, everything that has to do with infants.

She started her business due to financial necessity, exploring the entrepreneurial world. Little by little, she converted her sales into a store, which can be seen in the photo.

Since a new year is starting, she set some resolutions to work on, which are to improve her sales, expand her customer base, increase her profit, formalize her business, improve her point of sale, and, in 2 years, to have a new location. This is a very ambitious goal, but if one does not plan something, one does not fight for it.

With the help of a loan, she wants to buy an assortment of infant clothing and start the road towards fulfilling her duties, which will take a lot of work.

loans.use: to buy an assortment of infant clothing. She is a very hardworking woman.

loans.name: Paola Marivel

texts.es: A su corta edad que es de 19 años Paola se dedica a la venta de ropa y a estudiar a distancia, ya que a sus padres no les alcanza los recursos económicos para darle sus estudios, Paola necesita el crédito para invertir en la compra de mercadería en ropa, lo que Paola desea de su negocio es mejorar sus ventas para tener buen ingresos que le permita seguir estudiando.
texts.en: At the young age of 19 years, Paola works selling clothing and she also studies in a distance education program, because her parents lack the resources to provide her with an education.  Paola needs this loan to invest in merchandise for her clothing business.  Paola wants to improve her sales so that she can generate the income she needs to continue with her studies.

loans.use: to buy clothing to sell

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy 24 coffee thermoses and a cart, so that he might be able to create two jobs.

loans.name: Gulnara

texts.ru: Гульнара, 55 лет, вдова, есть 2 детей. У нее высшее образование, на протяжении 16 лет занимается торговлей трикотажных изделий и обуви на местном рынке. Благодаря упорному труду, Гульнара на сегодняшний день имеет в обороте  товар на сумму 180,000 сом (KGS). Ежемесячная прибыль Гульнары составляет 9,000 сом (KGS), однако этих средств не хватает на достойную жизнь Гульнары. Поэтому в целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Гульнара обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 100,000 сом (KGS) на покупку товара для увеличения ассортимента и привлечения новых покупателей. Доходы от кредита она планирует вложить в дальнейшее развитие своего бизнеса, чтобы иметь возможность улучшить условия проживания ее семьи.
texts.en:
Gulnara is 55, a widow, and has two children.  She has a university education and has earned her living selling knitted clothing and shoes at a local marketplace.  Thanks to her persistent efforts, Gulnara currently has 180,000 som worth of goods in stock, and her monthly profit is around 9,000 som.  

All the same, this money isn't enough to provide a decent standard of living for Gulnara.  Thus, for the future development of her business, Gulnara has requested a loan of 100,000 som from Bai Tushum Bank to stock up on certain items so she can increase the variety of her offering and attract new customers.  She plans on using her extra income due to the loan to further develop her business so she can improve her family's living conditions.

loans.use: stock up on clothing for resale to increase the variety of her shop's offering and her profit

loans.name: Nicolasa

texts.es:
Nicolasa tiene 35 años de edad, es viuda, vive con sus dos hijos en el distrito de Pucará, ubicado en la provincia de Jaén, región Cajamarca, en la sierra norte de Perú. La vida en este distrito es tranquila, la población se dedica a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería.

Ella se dedica a la venta de productos como arroz, azúcar, fideos, aceite, entre otros, tiene una tienda que se encuentra ubicada en su mismo domicilio. Cuenta con más de 01 año de experiencia en el negocio y con muy buenas referencias personales y laborales en su distrito. El préstamo será para la compra de una mayor cantidad de productos como arroz, azúcar, aceite, entre otros, para incrementar el stock de su tienda, con esto Nicolasa espera ofrecer mayor variedad de productos a sus clientes satisfaciendo sus gustos y preferencias lo que le permitirá incrementar sus ventas y por ende mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Nicolasa is 35 years old. She is a widow and lives with her two children in the district of Pucará, located in the province of Jaén, in the region of Cajamarca, in the mountains in northern Peru. Life in this district is quiet. The people there work in agriculture, commerce, and livestock.

She sells products such as rice, sugar, noodles, and cooking oil, among other things. She has a store, located in her house. She has more than 1 year of experience in the business, and very good personal and work references in her district. The loan will be for buying a larger quantity of products such as rice, sugar, and cooking oil, among other things, so she can increase the stock in her store. With this, Nicolasa hopes to offer a greater variety of products to her customers, satisfying their likes and preferences, which will allow her to increase her sales, and thereby improve her quality of life.

loans.use: to buy a larger quantity of products such as rice, sugar, and cooking oil, among other things, so she can increase the stock in her store

loans.name: Maria Jenivera

texts.es:
María es una práctica, creativa, ágil, confeccionista de 31 años de edad, la cual aprendió del negocio gracias, a empleos anteriores que tuvo en grandes empresas confeccionista, pero por el bajo sueldo y la falta de prestaciones decidió emprender su propio camino y así fundo su negocio de confecciones a terceros que carece de una maquina muy necesaria la cual es una maquina curadora  de poste, con esta máquina agilizara su confección, podrá organizar prendas con errores, y recibir varios pedidos de prendas las cuales solo puede confeccionar con dicha máquina.
María le urge esta máquina, está un tanto desesperada, su negocio es lo único que tiene para alimentarse y este empuje de nueva máquina traerá nuevos cambios significativos, positivos en la economía de la empresaria.
texts.en:
María is a practical and nimble seamstress. She is 31 years old. She learned the business from previous jobs that she had in large sewing businesses. But because of the low wages and lack of benefits, she decided to start on her own path and established her sewing business as a subcontractor. She is in need of a very necessary sewing machine, which is a post-bed sewing machine. With this machine, she will be able to speed up her sewing, organize items with errors, and receive orders for clothing items that can only be made with this machine. 

María needs this machine urgently. She is a bit desperate because her business is all she has to feed herself. Having this new machine will bring new, significant, and positive, changes to her economic situation.

loans.use: to buy a post-bed sewing machine.

loans.name: Kien's Group

texts.en:
Mr. Kien, born in 1983, is a Thai ethnic man living with his wife and his two children, one son and one daughter, in Son La city, Son La province. 

His family’s main income is from his wife’s meager salary so he has to find extra work to get additional money to cover his family’s living expenses and feed his two children while he is intending to do the sanitation work but he doesn’t have enough money to buy materials. Therefore, he wants to borrow a loan to buy materials for the sanitation work.

He expects much from the loan, which will help his family have better living conditions, and he will work hard to get money to repay the loan for M7-MFI on time.

loans.use: to buy materials for sanitation work

loans.name: La's Group

texts.en:
Mrs. La, born in 1976, is a Thai ethnic woman. Her family has three members: her husband, her son and her. Her family lives in Mai Son district, Son La province.

Her family’s main income is from cultivation and breeding, so the income is just temporary enough to cover the family’s living expense and she has saved a little amount. But the saved amount is not enough to buy fertilizer for the upcoming coffee crop, so she wants to borrow a loan to buy fertilizer for the coffee field.

She expects the loan will help her family invest effectively in her coffee field, and the coffee field will bring her family an abundant crop. She will work hard to get money to repay the loan for M7-MFI on time.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer for the coffee field

loans.name: Thuom's Group

texts.en:
Mrs. Thuom, born in 1984, is a Thai ethnic woman. Her family has four members including her husband, her son, her daughter and her. Her family currently lives in Mai Son district, Son La province. Her two children are both obedient and good at learning; one is in primary school and one is in  junior secondary school. 

Her family’s main income is mostly from cultivation and breeding, so with the income after deducting all costs, she has to be very economical in order to have enough to cover her family’s living expenses and save a little. There is not enough left to pay for her children’s education fees. Therefore, she wants to borrow a loan to invest in her children’s education.

She expects the loan will help her children have better conditions for learning so they will have a brighter future. She will works hard to have money to repay the loan to M7-MFI on time.

loans.use: to invest in her children’s education

loans.name: Veronica Del Carmen

texts.es:
VERÓNICA DE 33 ANOS DE EDAD, CASADA CON DOS HIJOS MENORES DE EDAD, LOS CUALES  ESTÁN ESTUDIANDO EN PRIMARIA, ES ORIGINARIOS DE MANAGUA,  ESTA JOVEN MUJER SE CARACTERIZA POR SER  TRABAJADORA, RESPONSABLE CON GANAS DE SUPERACIÓN PERSONAL,  ELLA LAMENTABLEMENTE POR FALTA DE APOYO ECONÓMICO NO PUDO SEGUIR ESTUDIANDO, Y SE VIO EN LA NECESIDAD DE TRABAJAR PARA AYUDAR CON LOS GASTOS DE SU HOGAR  PORQUE SE COMPROMETIÓ A MUY TEMPRANA EDAD.
EN LA ACTUALIDAD  TIENE  UNA ACTIVIDAD ECONÓMICA LA VENTA DE COMIDA, LA CUAL DESEMPEÑA EN SU CASA DE HABITACIÓN, LA RUTINA DE TRABAJO DE VERÓNICA ES DE UNAS DOCE HORAS DIARIAS DESDE LA PREPARACIÓN DE LA COMIDA HASTA SU VENTA, ACTIVIDAD QUE LA DESEMPEÑA CON MUCHO GUSTOS, PORQUE HA SIDO LA FORMA DE VIDA DE SU FAMILIA. SU RUTINA ES LEVANTARSE A LAS 5: DE LA MANANA A PREPARAR LA CARNE, GALLO PINTO, TACOS, MADUROS, ETC YA QUE VENDE DESAYUNOS, Y TAMBIÉN ALMUERZO, EL OBJETIVO DEL CREDITO ES INVERTIR EN CAPITAL DE TRABAJO Y COMPRA PRODUCTOS COMESTIBLES COMO, ARROZ, CARNE, POLLOS, VERDURAS, PLÁTANOS, TORTILLAS, CONDIMENTOS, FRIJOLES, ETC,  PARA QUE EN UN FUTURO NO MUY LEJANO PUEDA OBTENER MEJORES INGRESOS. VERÓNICA AGRADECE LA AYUDA QUE LOS INVERSIONISTAS KIVA LE BRINDAN A PERSONAS DE ESCASOS RECURSOS Y PAÍSES POBRE COMO ES NICARAGUA PARA TENER UN MEDIO DE TRABAJO DIGNO.
texts.en:
Verónica is 33 years old, married, and has two minor children who are studying in primary school. She is from Managua. She is characterized by being a hard worker, responsible, and with a great personal desire to get ahead. Unfortunately, due to a lack of economic support, was not able to continue her studies. She needed to work in order to help out with the household expenses because she got engaged at a very early age. 

She currently has a business selling food that she makes in her house. Verónica’s work schedule is twelve hours per day, from the preparation of the food to its sale. She has really liked doing this job, because it has been the way of making a living for her family. She gets up at 5:00 in the morning to prepare the meat, rice and beans, tacos, plantains, etc., because she sells breakfasts and also lunch. 

The goal of the loan is to invest in the purchase of food products such as rice, beef, chicken, vegetables, plantains, tortillas, condiments, beans, etc., so that in the not-too-distant future she can earn a better income. 

Verónica is grateful that Kiva lenders provide support for people of scarce resources from poor countries like Nicaragua so they can have dignified livelihood.

loans.use: to buy food products such as rice, beef, chicken, vegetables, plantains, tortillas, condiments, beans, etc.,

loans.name: Thong's Group

texts.en:
Mrs. Thong, born in 1965, is a Thai ethnic woman. She currently lives with her husband and her two sons in Mai Son district, Son La province.

Her family's main income is from cultivation and breeding, so the income is just enough to cover food for the whole family and save a little. She intends to change cultivation methods in her garden, changing from using chemical fertilizer to organic fertilizer for her coffee garden. But, because the investment costs for buying organic fertilizer is one and a half times more expensive than chemical fertilizer, her savings is not enough to buy organic fertilizer. Therefore, she wants to borrow a loan to buy organic fertilizer.

She hopes the loan amount will help her family invest effectively with high productivity and bring her family an abundant crop. She will work hard to have money to repay the loan from M7-MFI on time.

loans.use: to buy organic fertilizer

loans.name: Clara Paula

texts.es:
