En la ciudad de Pedernales cada quince días se reúne el Grupo De Crédito mujeres emprendedoras, se lo conoce por estar rodeada de playas que bañan la costa, la gente se dedica a la pesca y a trabajar en camaroneras.
En este lugar vive la señora Clara, tiene 43 años de edad, mantiene una relación de unión libre y de esta relación tiene dos  hijos de 25  y 24 años de edad, una de ellos aun vive con ellos y tres nietos a quienes ayudan a salir adelante. El marido es comerciante.
Doña Clara junto a su esposo se dedican al comercio, ellos  tienen una tienda de víveres en su casa, allí  venden todo tipo de productos de primera necesidad así como también carnes, legumbres, frutas, entre otros productos, ellos ya llevan más de tres años con este negocio el cual les permite ganarse la vida honradamente,  con los créditos ella surtió su negocio y así mismo con los créditos que ha recibido ha ido aumentando para brindar un mejor servicio a sus clientes. 
Este crédito es para comprar arroz, detergentes carnes, entre otras cosas que vende. Lleva más de 5 años en el Grupo de Crédito y le gusta porque con los créditos empezó su negocio. Sus sueños son seguir aumentado su negocio.
texts.en:
Every 15 days the women of the lending group Grupo de Creditos meet in the city of Pedernales, a place known for the surrounding beaches that bathe the coast, and for the inhabitants who work as fishermen and shrimpers.

Clara, 43, is married and has two children, ages 24 and 25, one of whom still lives at home along with three grandchildren who they help support. Her husband is a merchant. Clara and her spouse have a grocery store in their home where they sell basic goods like meat, legumes, fruits and other products. They have been doing this business for more than three years, and it allows them to earn a living honorably.

With the loan, Clara will stock her store as she has done with past credits. She is increasing little by little to give better service to her customers. She will use this loan to buy rice, detergents, meats and other things she sells. She has been with the lending group for more than 5 years and likes it because she used the loans to start her business. Her dream is to continue growing her business.

loans.use: to buy rice, detergent, meat, etc.

loans.name: Uuganbaatar

texts.en: Mr. Uuganbaatar, 33 years old, lives with his wife and daughter in Ulaanbaatar, capital city of Mongolia. He has been working as an excavator operator since 2011. His wife is currently unemployed and she stays at home doing house chores. Their daughter goes to kindergarten. He is requesting a loan of 3000 USD to buy spare parts in order to repair his old damaged excavator. As a result, he can continue to work as an operator and earn money for his family.

loans.use: to buy spare parts for his broken excavator

loans.name: Thinh's Group

texts.en:
Mrs. Thinh is a Kinh ethnic woman who has been participating in the M7-MFI program since June 2014. She currently lives with her husband and her son in Mai Son district, in Son La province.

	Her family lives mainly based on cultivation and animal breeding. Each year she sells several pig herds for taking meat, with income of approximately VND 100 million, but the income after deducting costs is just enough to cover the family’s living expense and to save the little amount left. But that saved amount is not enough to invest in expanding sow breeding. That is the reason why she wants to borrow a loan to invest in breeding.

	She will find extra work to get money to repay the loan for M7-MFI on time. She expects the loan will help her family invest effectively in breeding and that next year her family will have a substantial profit.

loans.use: to invest in animal breeding

loans.name: Ravy

texts.en:
Ravy, 27 years old, is a lovely father of two dependent children who are currently in school. He lives in a small community of Kampong Speu Province, Cambodia. He is a Prohok (Cambodian salty fish) seller. So far, he has been in this type of business for two years. On average, he is able to make an income of USD 5.00 per day. 

Ravy is living in an old house and he wants to build a comfortable one for his family. As he does not have the budget to do this, he is now applying for a Kiva loan through HKL to buy construction supplies such as bricks, cement, iron, stone, timber and sand to build a new house. Through this loan, he hopes he can experience living in a comfortable house. He is thankful to all lenders for their financial support toward poor people.

loans.use: to build a new house

loans.name: Valentina

texts.en: Valentina is 45 years old, married and has three children. She is a vegetable vendor at Solana. She wanted to improve her income by selling more vegetables to sell. So she is now asking for additional capital of P 5,000 to buy tomatoes, eggplant, cabbage, squash and onions to sell. She hopes to earn good profits in her business.

loans.use: to buy tomatoes, eggplant, cabbage, squash and onions to sell

loans.name: Febe

texts.en:
Febe works hard to support her family. Febe is married and has a house rental business in the Philippines.

Febe requested a PHP 25,000 loan through NWTF to buy additional materials like wood, nails, paint, etc. for the maintenance of her business.

Febe has been in this business for six years now.

Febe would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy additional materials like wood, nails, paint, etc. for the maintenance of her business

loans.name: Gemma

texts.en:
Gemma is a 46 year-old married woman with eight children, four of whom are currently in school.

Gemma has a fishing business in the Philippines. Gemma requested a PHP 30000 loan amount through NWTF to purchase materials for the maintenance of her fishing boat.

Gemma has been in this business for 27 years. In the future, Gemma would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase materials for the maintenance of her fishing boat

loans.name: Haidee

texts.en:
Haidee works hard to support her family. Haidee is married and has a buy and sell ready-to-wear business in the Philippines.

Haidee requested a PHP 13000 loan through NWTF to buy more stock of ready-to-wear to sell to her customers.

Haidee has been in this business for 5 years now.

In the future, Haidee would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy more stock of ready-to-wear to sell to her customers

loans.name: Jizelle

texts.en:
Jizelle is a married woman with four children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. Jizelle is 28 years old and has three children who are currently in school.

Jizelle has a bag making business in the Philippines. Jizelle requested a PHP 18000 loan amount through NWTF to purchase additional materials for her business.

Jizelle has been in this business for 3 years. In the future, Jizelle would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase additional material for her business

loans.name: Son's Group

texts.en:
Mrs Son is a Kinh ethnic woman who currently lives with her husband and her son in Mai Son district, Son La province. Her family’s main income is from breeding. Each year she can sell from two to three tons of pig meat, getting more than VND 100 million, but it is not considerable after deducting all investment costs. Therefore, she has to think very carefully when spending money, in order to have enough money to cover the living expenses of the whole family and save a small amount. But the saved amount is not enough to expand sow raising for breeding sows and to buy some corn as reserved food for the pigs, so she wants to borrow a loan to invest in breeding.

She expects the loan will help her family invest timely and effectively with high productivity, and she will work hard to get money to repay the loan for M7-MFI on time.

loans.use: to invest in animal breeding

loans.name: Dieu's Group

texts.en: Mrs. Dieu is a Kinh ethnic woman currently living with her husband and her two children, one son and one daughter, in Mai Son district, Son La province. Her family’s main income is mostly from her meager retirement pension, so it is just enough to cover the family’s living expenses. Therefore, she has to find extra work to get additional income for the family. But it is still too little; while she really wants to invest in expanding pig breeding for meat, she does not have enough money. She wants to borrow a loan to invest in expanding breeding. She expects the loan amount will help her family invest effectively in breeding and the next pig herd will bring her family a significant amount of interest. She will work hard to get money to repay the loan for M7-MFI on time.

loans.use: to invest in expanding animal breeding

loans.name: Narantsetseg

texts.en: Mrs. Narantsetseg, 55 years old, lives with her son and daughter-in-law in Ulaanbaatar, the capital city of Mongolia. She has been working as an operator at a water distribution line since 2013. Her son drives a bus around the city. Her daughter-in-law has taken her maternity leave and she is staying at home currently. She is requesting a loan of 1,200,000 MNT to buy building materials such as bricks, cement, fiberglass and foam for her house renovation. After renovation, her pregnant daughter-in-law will live in a comfortable and warm place where less coal is burned and less pollutants are released into the air.

loans.use: to renovate her house in order to burn less coal

loans.name: Bahrigul

texts.ru: Бахригул жительница района Яван. Она замужем и мать двоих детей. Муж работает таксистом. Ее дети учатся в средней школе, и им по 15 и 12 лет. Бахригул ответственная и серьезная женщина. Она занимается выращиванием  молодых телят. Ей в работе помогают дети после школы. Бахригул занимается этой деятельностью уже более 8 лет. У Бахригул имеется два бычка. Бахригул сейчас нуждается в кредите для продолжения деятельности. Она на сумму запрашиваемого кредита хочет купить запас корм для скота, чтобы они не остались без корма в холодные дни зимнего сезона. Ваш кредит поможет Бахригул и ее скотинам. В будущем Бахригул планирует  увеличить  поголовье скота. Бахригул сейчас верит и надеется на поддержку с Вашей стороны.
texts.en:
Bahrigul lives in the Yavan district of Tajikistan.  She is married and the mother of two children.  Her husband works as a taxi driver.  Her children are 12 and 15 years old and they are both in secondary school.  Bahrigul is a responsible and serious woman.  She raises young calves.  Her children help her after school.  Bahrigul has been involved in this activity for more than eight years and she currently has two bull-calves.

Bahrigul needs a loan to be able to pursue her activity.  With the requested amount of money, she wants to buy fodder, so that she can feed her calves during the cold winter months.  The money you will lend to Bahrigul will help her as well as her livestock.  In the future, she would like to increase her cattle headcount.  Bahrigul is confident that you will help her and she is looking forward to your support.

loans.use: to buy livestock feed.

loans.name: Khursand

texts.ru:
Хурсанд жительница района Шахритус, и она трудолюбивая женщина. Ей 37 лет. У Хурсанд прекрасная семья. Она замужем и имеет четверых детей. Две дочери и два сына. Дочкам 12 и 5 лет. Сыновьям 14 и 10 лет. Ее муж работник в сельской местности. Дети учатся в средней школе. 
Она занимается животноводством, и в свободное время занимается шитьем женкой одежды. Ей нравится своя работа и в работе помогает ее муж. Животноводства является основной деятельностью, потому что доход  от этого бизнеса семью. Хурсанд любит домашних животных, по этой причине она занимается животноводством. Она занимается этим бизнесом более 2 лет. Хурсанд в основном разводит молодых телят и в дальнейшем после откорма перепродает их на скотном рынке. Хурсанд просит кредит, чтобы купить несколько молодых телят и увеличить поголовье скота и доход от животноводческой деятельности. Ваш кредит поможет ей достичь своих целей и дать новые экономические возможности семье. Поддержите Хурсанд!
texts.en:
Khursand lives in the Shahrituz district of Tajikistan.  She is 37 years old and a hardworking woman. She has a beautiful family: she is married and the mother of four children (two daughters, ages 12 and 5, and two sons who are 14 and 10 years old).  Her children are all in school.  Khursand's husband is a rural laborer.  Khursand herself is involved in animal husbandry and, in her spare time, she also sews women's clothes.  She likes her work and she also helps her husband with his own work.  Animal husbandry is the family's main activity and main source of income. 

Khursand loves farms animals, and this is the reason why she has chosen to raise livestock.  She has been working in this field for more than two years now.  She essentially raises young calves, fattens them up and then resells them at the cattle market.  She is taking a loan to buy a few additional calves, so that she can increase her livestock headcount as well as the income that the family makes from animal husbandry.  The money you'll lend to Khursand will give her the opportunity to achieve her goals and will help create new economic opportunities for her family.  Please support Khursand!

loans.use: to buy a few head of cattle and increase her activity.

loans.name: Luzviminda

texts.en: Luzviminda is 57 years old, married, and her family lives in Solana. She uses her skills in sewing services as income. She is now asking for a loan of 5,000 PHP to buy cloth, thread, needles, and zippers to use in her sewing services. This will help improve her output in sewing school uniforms and tablecloths. Additional revenue will sustain the needs of her family and help her save for her family's future expenses.

loans.use: to buy cloth, thread, needles, and zippers to use in her sewing services

loans.name: Josepina

texts.en:
Josepina is a married woman with one child. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. Josepina is 41 years old and has one child who is in school.

Josepina has a general store business in the Philippines. Josepina requested a PHP 10,000 loan amount through NWTF to purchase more stock to sell in her general store.

Josepina has been in this business for six years. In the future, Josepina would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more stock to sell in her general store

loans.name: Luema

texts.en:
Luema is a married woman with two children. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. Luema is 38 years old and has two children who are in school.

Luema has a general store business in the Philippines. Luema requested a loan of 12,000 PHP through NWTF to buy more groceries to sell in her general store.

She successfully paid back her previous loan and is now requesting a new loan to further build her general store business.

Luema has been in this business for six years. In the future, Luema would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy more groceries to sell in her general store

loans.name: Luz

texts.en:
Luz is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a food vending business in the Philippines. 

She is borrowing PHP 27,000 through NWTF to purchase ingredients like meat, vegetables, spices, etc. for her food vending business.

Luz has been in this business for 12 years. Luz earns more income from a general store.

She successfully paid back her previous loan and is now requesting a new loan to further build her business.

Luz has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts with the help of the loans from NWTF. She dreams of saving enough money to afford to send her children to college in the future.

loans.use: to purchase ingredients like meat, vegetables, spices, etc. for her food production business

loans.name: Nancy

texts.en:
Nancy is 58 years old and married with three children. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. 

Nancy has a fruit vending business in the Philippines. Nancy requested a loan of 29,500 PHP through NWTF to purchase more fruit to sell in her fruit stand.

She successfully paid back her previous loan and is now requesting a new loan to further build her business.

Nancy has been in this business for 11 years. Nancy would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase more fruit to sell in her fruit stand

loans.name: Gennie

texts.en:
Gennie is 42 years old and married with three children. With three children currently in school, Gennie works very hard to provide for them.

Gennie runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 15,000 loan through NWTF to buy additional stock like shampoo, detergent soap, canned goods, coffee, juice, soft drinks, etc. to sell.

Gennie has been in this business for five years and sells a variety of items such as shampoo, detergent soap, canned goods, coffee, juice, soft drinks, etc. 

In the future, Gennie would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy additional stock like shampoo, detergent soap, canned goods, coffee, juice, soft drinks, etc. to sell

loans.name: Juditha

texts.en:
Juditha is a married woman with four children. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. Juditha is 30 years old and has four children who are in school.

Juditha has a general store business in the Philippines. Juditha requested a loan of 20,000 PHP through NWTF to buy more groceries to sell in her general store.

Juditha has been in this business for four years. In the future, Juditha would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy more groceries to sell in her general store

loans.name: Anamae

texts.en:
As a married parent of four children, Anamae works hard to support her family.

She has a fish vending business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from a general store and restaurant. Anamae is borrowing PHP 19,500 through NWTF to purchase additional boxes of fish to sell for her fish vending business.

Anamae has been sustaining her business activities through her past 20 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream of saving enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional boxes of fish to sell.

loans.name: Maria Guadalupe

texts.es: Guadalupe es una señora de 44 años de edad, es madre soltera, sus 3 hijos tienen 10, 17 y 23 años de edad, la de 10 años asiste a la escuela, la de 23 años se salió de la universidad el anterior semestre debido a que no tiene recursos económicos y se puso a trabajar, y el joven de 17 años de edad estudia en las mañanas y en la tarde i noche se dedica a   trabajar, Guadalupe se dedica a la venta de almuerzos y comidas rapidas, ella necesita al crédito para la compra de productos de para prepararlos, lo que Guadalupe aspira es mejorar su negocio, mejorar sus ventas y asi apoyar en lo que mas pueda para que sus hijos sigan estudiando.
texts.en:
Guadalupe is a 44-year-old woman and single mother. Her children are 10, 17 and 23 years old. The 10 year old attends school while the 23 year old left the university last semester because he did not have the financial resources and had to work. The 17 year old studies in the mornings and spends the afternoons and nights working. 

She makes a living selling lunches and fast foods, and she needs the loan to purchase products in order to prepare them. Guadalupe aspires to improve her business and sales – and thus support what she can so her children continue studying.

loans.use: to buy products to prepare them.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy pigs

loans.name: Cherry Mae

texts.en:
Cherry Mae is 27 years old and married with two children.

She works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional stock like coffee, sardines, spices, etc. to sell.

Cherry Mae has borrowed and paid back three loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for eight years and also earns an income from prepaid mobile load.

She aspires to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional stock like coffee, sardines, spices, etc. to sell.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy chickens

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy pigs

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy and build a bathroom, septic tank, and a toilet at their home to improve access to water and sanitation for their family.

loans.name: Khaticha

texts.ru:
Эту женщину зовут Хатича. Она трудолюбивая женщина. Хатича занимается земледелием, где она арендует 1 га земельного участка возле дома. Хатича три года назад начала заниматься растениеводческой деятельностью. Она на половину земли посадила лук и на другой части Хатича планирует посадить картофель. Хатича радуется, когда получает хороший урожай, потому что доход от этого бизнеса обеспечивает условия жизни  ее семьи.  Ей надо купить качественных семян картофеля и минеральных удобрение, чтобы получить богатый  урожай, по этой причине Хатича обратилась за кредитом, чтобы продолжать продвигаться дальше. Это кредит поможет ей улучшить и расширить земледелие. 
Хатича проживает вместе семьей в районе Кубадиён. Она замужем. У нее четверо детей. Дети учатся в средней школе. Хатича надеется на Вашу помощь и считает, что с Вашей помощью она сможет закончить посев и на следующий сезон собрать хороший урожай.
texts.en:
This hard-working woman's name is Khaticha. She grows farm crops on a leased land plot of 1 ha [2.5 acres] near her house. Khaticha started doing farming three years ago. She has planted onions on one half of her land and intends to plant potatoes on the other half. Khaticha is happy when she is able to produce a large harvest because the income from this business supports her family. Khaticha needs to buy quality potato seeds and mineral fertilizers in order to  have a high yield of crops. This is why Khaticha has applied for a loan to keep moving ahead. This loan will allow her to improve and expand her farming business.

Khaticha lives with her family in the Qubadiyon region. She is married and has four children. Her children attend secondary school. Khaticha is hoping for your help and believes that, with your help, she will be able to finish planting and enjoy a large harvest next season.

loans.use: to buy potato seeds and mineral fertilizers.

loans.name: Firuza

texts.ru: Это Фируза. Ей всего 34 лет. Она проживает в городе Душанбе. Фируза добрая и ответственная женщина. Она замужем и у нее трое детей. Ее муж занимается бизнесом.  Фируза занимается шитьем женской одежды. Ей удобно, шить на дому, она параллельно ведет домашнее хозяйство.  Фируза от дохода своей деятельностью копила денег, чтобы отремонтировать дом. Сейчас ей не хватает денежных средств, чтобы отремонтировать дом. Из-за нехватки денег она обратилась за кредитом, чтобы купить стройматериалы для ремонта. Это кредит поможет Фирузе достичь свою цель. Она очень нуждается в ремонте. Фируза верит в Вас и на Вашу поддержку.
texts.en: Meet Firuza, a 34-year-old resident of the city of Dushanbe, and a kind and responsible woman.  She is married and the mother of three children.  Her husband works in business and Firuza herself sews women's clothes.  She finds it very convenient to work from home as this activity allows her to take care of the household at the same time.  From the earnings that she gets from sewing, she has already saved some money to renovate her house, but she still doesn't have enough.  She is therefore taking a loan which will help her to buy the necessary building materials to repair her house. This loan will help Firuza to achieve her goals, as she really needs to renovate her house.  Firuza relies on you and your support.

loans.use: to renovate her house.
